baloovonbruinwaldxiii.Name: Baloo - von Bruinwald XIII
baloovonbruinwaldxiii.Body_Text:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

Let's Make Like A Tree - When this character is banished, gain 2 lore.

bernardbrandnewagent.Name: Bernard - Brand-New Agent
bernardbrandnewagent.Flavor_Text: "You stay there. I'll look for scattered lore."
bernardbrandnewagent.Body_Text: I'll Check It Out - At the end of your turn, if this character is exerted, you may ready another chosen character of yours.

chernabogevildoer.Name: Chernabog - Evildoer
chernabogevildoer.Body_Text:
The Power Of Evil - For each character card in your discard, you pay 1{i} less to play this character.

Summon The Spirits - When you play this character, shuffle all character cards from your discard into your deck.

dalmatianpuppytailwagger.Name: Dalmatian Puppy - Tail Wagger
dalmatianpuppytailwagger.Flavor_Text: First they steal your heart. Then they steal your chair.
dalmatianpuppytailwagger.Body_Text: Where Did They All Come From? - You may have up to 99 copies of Dalmatian Puppy - Tail Wagger in your deck.

joshuasweetthedoctor.Name: Joshua Sweet - The Doctor
joshuasweetthedoctor.Flavor_Text: "Heading out into the Inklands? Come on back if you need patching up."
joshuasweetthedoctor.Body_Text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

kidaprotectorofatlantis.Name: Kida - Protector of Atlantis
kidaprotectorofatlantis.Flavor_Text: "She has been chosen." - King Kashekim Nedakh
kidaprotectorofatlantis.Body_Text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3{i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Kida.)

Perhaps We Can Save Our Future - When you play this character, all characters get -3{s} until the start of your next turn.

luckythe15thpuppy.Name: Lucky - The 15th Puppy
luckythe15thpuppy.Body_Text:
Good As New - {e}: Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. You may put each character card with cost 2 or less into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

Puppy Love - Whenever this character quests, if you have 4 or more other characters in play, your other characters get +1{l} this turn.

minniemousemusicalartist.Name: Minnie Mouse - Musical Artist
minniemousemusicalartist.Flavor_Text: Her musical talents are off the charts!
minniemousemusicalartist.Body_Text:
Singer 3 (This character counts as cost 3 to sing songs.)

Entourage - Whenever you play a character with Bodyguard, you may remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.

missbiancarescueaidsocietyagent.Name: Miss Bianca - Rescue Aid Society Agent
missbiancarescueaidsocietyagent.Flavor_Text:
"Our society has never failed to answer a call for help."
-Mr. Chairman
missbiancarescueaidsocietyagent.Body_Text: Singer 4 (This character counts as cost 4 to sing songs.)

mrsnoopsineptbusinessman.Name: Mr. Snoops - Inept Businessman
mrsnoopsineptbusinessman.Flavor_Text:
"This is simple, Snoops! I want that lore! The one that shines like a diamond!"
-Madame Medusa

naniprotectivesister.Name: Nani - Protective Sister
naniprotectivesister.Body_Text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

orvilleacepilot.Name: Orville - Ace Pilot
orvilleacepilot.Flavor_Text: "Boy, look at those things go! Whaddya call 'em? Inkrunners? I wish I could fly like that."

patchintimidatingpup.Name: Patch - Intimidating Pup
patchintimidatingpup.Flavor_Text: Just like Thunderbolt, he'll stand up to any bad guy.
patchintimidatingpup.Body_Text: Bark - {e}: Chosen character gets -2{s} until the start of your next turn.

perditadevotedmother.Name: Perdita - Devoted Mother
perditadevotedmother.Flavor_Text: Her pups will follow her anywhere.
perditadevotedmother.Body_Text: Come Along, Children - When you play this character and whenever she quests, you may play a character with cost 2 or less from your discard for free.

pigletpoohpiratecaptain.Name: Piglet - Pooh Pirate Captain
pigletpoohpiratecaptain.Flavor_Text: "Ahoy! There's lore out there, and I'm g-gonna find it!"
pigletpoohpiratecaptain.Body_Text: And I'm The Captain! - While you have 2 or more other characters in play, this character gets +2{l}.

plutodetermineddefender.Name: Pluto - Determined Defender
plutodetermineddefender.Body_Text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5{i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Pluto.)

Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

Guard Dog - At the start of your turn, remove up to 3 damage from this character.

plutofriendlypooch.Name: Pluto - Friendly Pooch
plutofriendlypooch.Flavor_Text: He just can't wait for new friends to arrive!
plutofriendlypooch.Body_Text: Good Dog - {e}: You pay 1{i} less for the next character you play this turn.

pongodeterminedfather.Name: Pongo - Determined Father
pongodeterminedfather.Flavor_Text: "We'll find our way. I know we will!"
pongodeterminedfather.Body_Text: Twilight Bark - Once per turn, you may pay 2{i} to reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a character card, put it into your hand. Otherwise, Put it on the bottom of your deck.

queenofheartswonderlandempress.Name: Queen of Hearts - Wonderland Empress
queenofheartswonderlandempress.Flavor_Text: The more of the Inklands she claims, the more she wants.
queenofheartswonderlandempress.Body_Text: All Ways Here Are My Ways - Whenever this character quests, your other Villain characters get +1{l} this turn.

rollyhungrypup.Name: Rolly - Hungry Pup
rollyhungrypup.Body_Text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)

tinkerbellgenerousfairy.Name: Tinker Bell - Generous Fairy
tinkerbellgenerousfairy.Flavor_Text: Plenty of berries - and friendship - to go around.
tinkerbellgenerousfairy.Body_Text: Make A New Friend - When you play this character, look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal a character card and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of our deck in any order.

wendydarlingtalentedsailor.Name: Wendy Darling - Talented Sailor
wendydarlingtalentedsailor.Flavor_Text: With Tink's upgrades in place, Wendy took them to the skies to find the missing mermaid.

99puppies.Name: 99 Puppies
99puppies.Flavor_Text:
"Two, four, six, plus three is nine, plus two is 11 . . ."
-Roger
99puppies.Body_Text: Whenever one of your characters quests this turn, gain 1 lore.

bosssorders.Name: Boss's Orders
bosssorders.Flavor_Text:
"Snoops! I know you can look harder! Find me that lore!"
-Madame Medusa
bosssorders.Body_Text: Chosen character gains Support this turn. (Whenever they quest, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)

healwhathasbeenhurt.Name: Heal What Has Been Hurt
healwhathasbeenhurt.Flavor_Text:
Let your power shine
Make the clock reverse . . .
healwhathasbeenhurt.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 3 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)

Remove up to 3 damage from chosen character. Draw a card.

quickpatch.Name: Quick Patch
quickpatch.Body_Text: Remove up to 3 damage from chosen location

thebarenecessities.Name: The Bare Necessities
thebarenecessities.Flavor_Text: Forget about your worries and your strife. . . .
thebarenecessities.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 2 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)

Chosen opponent reveals their hand and discards a non-character card of your choice.

cleansingrainwater.Name: Cleansing Rainwater
cleansingrainwater.Flavor_Text: Rainwater lands as stone melts and dragons fly again.
cleansingrainwater.Body_Text: Ancient Power - Banish this item: Remove up to 2 damage from each of your characters.

heartofatlantis.Name: Heart of Atlantis
heartofatlantis.Flavor_Text:
"It's what's keeping you - all of Atlantis - alive!"
-Milo Thatch
heartofatlantis.Body_Text: Life Giver - {e}: You pay 2{i} less for the next character you play this turn.

wildcatswrench.Name: Wildcat's Wrench
wildcatswrench.Flavor_Text: The right tool makes all the difference.
wildcatswrench.Body_Text: Rebuild - {e}: Remove up to 2 damage from chosen location.

neverlandmermaidlagoon.Name: Never Land - Mermaid Lagoon
neverlandmermaidlagoon.Flavor_Text: The mermaids told Peter they'd seen some items floating by several days earlier, but they were more concerned that one of their sisters had gone missing.

pridelandspriderock.Name: Pride Lands - Pride Rock
pridelandspriderock.Body_Text:
We Are All Connected - Characters get +2{w} while here.

Lion Home - If you have a Prince or King character here, you pay 1{i} less to play characters.

tianaspalacejazzrestaurant.Name: Tiana's Palace - Jazz Restaurant
tianaspalacejazzrestaurant.Flavor_Text: In New Orleans, dreams can come true.
tianaspalacejazzrestaurant.Body_Text: Night Out - Characters can't be challenged while here.

aliceteaalchemist.Name: Alice - Tea Alchemist
aliceteaalchemist.Flavor_Text: With the right tea leaves and a little magic, she creates the perfect cup for any party guest.
aliceteaalchemist.Body_Text: Curiouser And Curiouser - {e}: Exert chosen opposing character and all other opposing characters with the same name.

chernabogsfollowerscreaturesofevil.Name: Chernabog's Followers - Creatures of Evil
chernabogsfollowerscreaturesofevil.Body_Text: Restless Souls - Whenever this character quests, you may banish them to draw a card.

diablofaithfulpet.Name: Diablo - Faithful Pet
diablofaithfulpet.Flavor_Text: With a little ink-enhanced magic, nothing escapes his sight.
diablofaithfulpet.Body_Text: Looking For Aurora - Whenever you play a character named Maleficent, you may look at the top card of your deck. Put it on the top or the bottom of your deck.

geniesupportivefriend.Name: Genie - Supportive Friend
geniesupportivefriend.Flavor_Text: "Right here, direct from the lamp, right here for your very much wish fulfillment."
geniesupportivefriend.Body_Text: Three Wishes - Whenever this character quests, you may shuffle this card into your deck to draw 3 cards.

iagoprettypolly.Name: Iago - Pretty Polly
iagoprettypolly.Flavor_Text:
"Your majesty certainly has a way with dumb animals."
-Jafar
iagoprettypolly.Body_Text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

jafarlampthief.Name: Jafar - Lamp thief
jafarlampthief.Flavor_Text: "I will rule as far as the eye can see."
jafarlampthief.Body_Text: I Am Your Master Now - When you play this character, look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Put one on the top of your deck and the other on the bottom.

jafarstrikingillusionist.Name: Jafar - Striking Illusionist
jafarstrikingillusionist.Body_Text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5{i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Jafar.)

Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

Power Beyond Measure - During your turn, while this character is exerted, whenever you draw a card, gain 1 lore.

lenasabrewingrebelliousteenager.Name: Lena Sabrewing - Rebellious Teenager
lenasabrewingrebelliousteenager.Flavor_Text: Born from the shadows. Saved by friendship.
lenasabrewingrebelliousteenager.Body_Text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)

magicbroomdancingduster.Name: Magic Broom - Dancing Duster
magicbroomdancingduster.Body_Text: Power Clean - When you play this character, if you have a Sorcerer character in play, you may exert chosen opposing character. They can't ready at the start of their next turn.

magicbroomswiftcleaner.Name: Magic Broom - Swift Cleaner
magicbroomswiftcleaner.Body_Text:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)

Clean This, Clean That - When you play this character, you may shuffle all Broom cards from your discard into your deck.

magicbroomthebigsweeper.Name: Magic Broom - The Big Sweeper
magicbroomthebigsweeper.Body_Text: Clean Sweep - While this character is at a location, it gets +2{s}.

magiccarpetflyingrug.Name: Magic Carpet - Flying Rug
magiccarpetflyingrug.Flavor_Text: "Carpet and I can swoop in, grab the lore, and be back before anyone knows it!" -Aladdin
magiccarpetflyingrug.Body_Text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

Find The Way - {e}: Move a character of yours to a location for free.

magicadespellambitiouswitch.Name: Magica De Spell - Ambitious Witch
magicadespellambitiouswitch.Flavor_Text: "Feed my power, Dark Eclipse. Free my form from the abyss. Dormant magic now unchain, the Shadow Queen be whole again!"

magicadespellthemidastouch.Name: Magica De Spell - The Midas Touch
magicadespellthemidastouch.Flavor_Text: "I can feel my powers growing the closer I get to Scrooge's precious dime!"
magicadespellthemidastouch.Body_Text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5{i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Magica De Spell.)

All Mine - Whenever this character quests, gain lore equal to the cost of one of your items in play.

magicadespellthievingsorceress.Name: Magica De Spell - Thieving Sorceress
magicadespellthievingsorceress.Flavor_Text: "Do you know what I call this? A good start!"
magicadespellthievingsorceress.Body_Text: Telekinesis - {e}: Return chosen item with cost equal to or less than this character's {s} to its player's hand.

maleficentmistressofallevil.Name: Maleficent - Mistress of All Evil
maleficentmistressofallevil.Body_Text:
Dark Knowledge - Whenever this character quests, you may draw a card.

Divination - During your turn, whenever you draw a card, you may move 1 damage counter from chosen character to chosen opposing character.

mamaodievoiceofwisdom.Name: Mama Odie - Voice of Wisdom
mamaodievoiceofwisdom.Flavor_Text: "That's the way to give it what it needs, Juju!"
mamaodievoiceofwisdom.Body_Text: Listen To Your Mama Now - Whenever this character quests, you may move up to 2 damage counters from chosen character to chosen opposing character.

puapotbelliedbuddy.Name: Pua - Potbellied Buddy
puapotbelliedbuddy.Flavor_Text: Always ready to lend a hand . . . er, snout.
puapotbelliedbuddy.Body_Text: Always There - When this character is banished, you may shuffle this card into your deck.

rafikimysticalfighter.Name: Rafiki - Mystical Fighter
rafikimysticalfighter.Body_Text: Challenger +3 (While challenging, this character gets +3{s}.)  Ancient Skills - Whenever he challenges a Hyena character, this character takes no damage from the challenge.

stratostornadotitan.Name: Stratos - Tornado Titan
stratostornadotitan.Body_Text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

Cyclone - {e}: Gain lore equal to the number of Titan characters you have in play.

thefirebirdforceofdestruction.Name: The Firebird - Force of Destruction
thefirebirdforceofdestruction.Flavor_Text:
It rages through the forest,
Wings spread wide with flame
Spring sings its ancient chorus
And green renews its claim

thequeenhatefulrival.Name: The Queen - Hateful Rival
thequeenhatefulrival.Flavor_Text:
"A cobweb's strand to hold her fast
An eagle's eye to see her well
Sands of time to steal her past
Thus I cast my magic spell!"

treasureguardianprotectorofthecave.Name: Treasure Guardian - Protector of the Cave
treasureguardianprotectorofthecave.Body_Text: Who Disturbs MY Slumber? - This character can't challenge or quest unless it is at a location.

ursulaseawitch.Name: Ursula - Sea Witch
ursulaseawitch.Flavor_Text: The secret contract has already been written
ursulaseawitch.Body_Text: You're Too Late - Whenever this character quests, chosen opposing character can't ready at the start of their next turn.

bestowagift.Name: Bestow A Gift
bestowagift.Flavor_Text:
"From magic ink I call this gift.
Fly my minion, thy wings be swift!"
-Maleficent
bestowagift.Body_Text: Move 1 damage counter from chosen character to chosen opposing character.

itcallsme.Name: It Calls Me
itcallsme.Flavor_Text: I am everything I've learned and more
itcallsme.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 1 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)

Draw a card. Then, choose up to 3 cards from chosen opponent's discard and shuffle them into their deck.

lastditcheffort.Name: Last-Ditch Effort
lastditcheffort.Body_Text: Exert chosen opposing character. Then chosen character of yours gains Challenger +2 this turn. (They get +2{s} when challenging.)

thebossisonaroll.Name: The Boss Is On A Roll
thebossisonaroll.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 3 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)

Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Put any number of them on the top of the bottom of your deck in any order. Gain 1 lore.

thelamp.Name: The Lamp
thelamp.Body_Text: Good Or Evil - Banish this item: If you have a character named Jafar in play, draw 2 cards. If you have a character named Genie in play, return chosen character with cost 4 or less to their players hand.

thesorcerershat.Name: The Sorcerer's Hat
thesorcerershat.Flavor_Text: Minnie approached it carefully. Whoever had placed it here might have prepared traps.
thesorcerershat.Body_Text: Incredible Energy - {e}, 1{i}: Name a card, then reveal the top card of your deck. If it's the named card, put that card into your hand. Otherwise, put it on the top of your deck.

forbiddenmountainmaleficentscastle.Name: Forbidden Mountain - Maleficent's Castle
forbiddenmountainmaleficentscastle.Flavor_Text: An eerie quiet surrounds the castle - but beware of the dangerous occupant within.

thequeenscastlemirrorchamber.Name: The Queen's Castle - Mirror Chamber
thequeenscastlemirrorchamber.Flavor_Text: Those who visit the mirror can choose their question - but not the answer.
thequeenscastlemirrorchamber.Body_Text: Using The Mirror - At the start of your turn, for each character you have here, you may draw a card.

thesorcererstowerwondrousworkspace.Name: The Sorcerer's Tower - Wondrous Workspace
thesorcererstowerwondrousworkspace.Flavor_Text: Everything you need to make some magic.
thesorcererstowerwondrousworkspace.Body_Text:
Broom Closet - Your characters named Magic Broom may move here for free.

Magical Power - Characters get +1{l} while here.

cubbymightylostboy.Name: Cubby - Mighty Lost Boy
cubbymightylostboy.Flavor_Text: With Peter holding off Hook, Cubby did what he does best: break stuff.
cubbymightylostboy.Body_Text: The Bear - Whenever this character moves to a location, he gets +3{s} this turn.

cursedmerfolkursulashandiwork.Name: Cursed Merfolk - Ursula's Handiwork
cursedmerfolkursulashandiwork.Flavor_Text:
"Now it's happened once or twice, someone couldn't pay the price . . ."
-Ursula
cursedmerfolkursulashandiwork.Body_Text: Poor Souls - Whenever this character is challenged, each opponent chooses and discards a card.

donkarnageprinceofpirates.Name: Don Karnage - Prince of Pirates
donkarnageprinceofpirates.Flavor_Text: "You didn't expect to find me here, did you? Well neither did I."
donkarnageprinceofpirates.Body_Text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

flotsamriffraff.Name: Flotsam - Riffraff
flotsamriffraff.Flavor_Text: "Ursula needs lore to complete her plan. . . ."
flotsamriffraff.Body_Text: Eerie Pair - Your characters named Jetsam get +3{s}.

friartuckpriestofnottingham.Name: Friar Tuck - Priest of Nottingham
friartuckpriestofnottingham.Flavor_Text: "Get outta my church! Out! Out! Out!"
friartuckpriestofnottingham.Body_Text: You Thieving Scoundrel - When you play this character, the player or players with the most cards in their hand chooses and discards a card.

helgasinclairfemmefatale.Name: Helga Sinclair - Femme Fatale
helgasinclairfemmefatale.Body_Text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3{i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Helga Sinclair.)

This Changes Everything - Whenever this character quests, you may deal 3 damage to chosen damaged character.

helgasinclairvengefulpartner.Name: Helga Sinclair - Vengeful Partner
helgasinclairvengefulpartner.Flavor_Text: "You said we were in this together!"
helgasinclairvengefulpartner.Body_Text: Nothing Personal - When this character is challenged and banished, banish the challenging character.

jetsamriffraff.Name: Jetsam - Riffraff
jetsamriffraff.Flavor_Text: "There must be powerful lore here, very powerful."
jetsamriffraff.Body_Text:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

Eerie Pair - Your characters named Flotsam gain Ward.

kitcloudkickertoughguy.Name: Kit Cloudkicker - Tough Guy
kitcloudkickertoughguy.Flavor_Text: "It's been fun, guys, but I got to be going. Yahoooo!"
kitcloudkickertoughguy.Body_Text: Skysurfing - When you play this character, you may return chosen opposing character with 2{s} or less to their player's hand.

lyletiberiusrourkecunningmercenary.Name: Lyle Tiberius Rourke - Cunning Mercenary
lyletiberiusrourkecunningmercenary.Body_Text:
Well, Now You Know - When you play this character, chosen opposing character gains Reckless during their next turn. (They can't quest and must challenge if able.)

Thanks For Volunteering - Whenever one of your other characters is banished, each opponent loses 1 lore.

milothatchclevercartographer.Name: Milo Thatch - Clever Cartographer
milothatchclevercartographer.Flavor_Text: "Believe me, studying gibberish really can take you places!"

milothatchkingofatlantis.Name: Milo Thatch - King of Atlantis
milothatchkingofatlantis.Flavor_Text: "You don't know what you're tampering with."
milothatchkingofatlantis.Body_Text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4{i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Milo Thatch.)

Take Them By Surprise - When this character is banished, return all opposing characters to their player's hands.

morphspacegoo.Name: Morph - Space Goo
morphspacegoo.Body_Text: Mimicry - You may play any character with Shift on this character as if this character had any name.

peterpanlostboyleader.Name: Peter Pan - Lost Boy Leader
peterpanlostboyleader.Flavor_Text: The Illumineers needed someone to find a missing spellbook, and Peter was the first to volunteer.
peterpanlostboyleader.Body_Text: I Came To Listen To The Stories - Once per turn, when this character moves to a location, gain lore equal to that location's {l}.

princejohnphonyking.Name: Prince John - Phony King
princejohnphonyking.Flavor_Text:
"Too late to be known as John the First, he's sure to be known as John the Worst!"
-Sheriff of Nottingham
princejohnphonyking.Body_Text: Collect Taxes - Whenever this character quests, each opponent with more lore than you loses 2 lore.

robinhooddaydreamer.Name: Robin Hood - Daydreamer
robinhooddaydreamer.Flavor_Text: "Some days, it's nice to let the river do the running."

shenzihyenapackleader.Name: Shenzi - Hyena Pack Leader
shenzihyenapackleader.Body_Text: I'll Handle This - While this character is at a location, she gets +3{s}. What's The Hurry? - While this character is at a location, whenever she challenges another character, you may draw a card.

sirhissaggravatingasp.Name: Sir Hiss - Aggravating Asp
sirhissaggravatingasp.Flavor_Text: Prince John isn't the only one collecting "taxes"!
sirhissaggravatingasp.Body_Text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

skippyenergeticrabbit.Name: Skippy - Energetic Rabbit
skippyenergeticrabbit.Flavor_Text: Even the bravest outlaw knows when to lie low.
skippyenergeticrabbit.Body_Text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

starkeydeviouspirate.Name: Starkey - Devious Pirate
starkeydeviouspirate.Flavor_Text: Point him in the right direction, and he'll do the rest

stitchcovertagent.Name: Stitch - Covert Agent
stitchcovertagent.Flavor_Text: For such a flashy dresser, he sure is hard to spot.
stitchcovertagent.Body_Text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

Hide - While this character is at a location, he gains Ward. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge.)

ursuladeceiver.Name: Ursula - Deceiver
ursuladeceiver.Body_Text: You'll Never Even Miss It - When you play this character, chosen opponent reveals their hand and discards a song card of your choice.

ursuladeceiverofall.Name: Ursula - Deceiver of All
ursuladeceiverofall.Flavor_Text: "I don't want much - just the most powerful lore!"
ursuladeceiverofall.Body_Text: What A Deal - Whenever this character sings a song, you may play that song again from your discard for free, then put it on the bottom of your deck.

wildcatmechanic.Name: Wildcat - Mechanic
wildcatmechanic.Flavor_Text: "I can take anything apart in under 5 minutes!"
wildcatmechanic.Body_Text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

Disassemble - {e}: Banish chosen item.

zazustewardofthepridelands.Name: Zazu - Steward of the Pride Lands
zazustewardofthepridelands.Flavor_Text: "I'd be lyin' if I said I ran the place, but welcome to the Pride Lands all the same!"
zazustewardofthepridelands.Body_Text: It's Time To Go! - While this character is at a location, he gets +1{l}.

hassetmyheaaaaaaart.Name: Has Set My Heaaaaaaart . . .
hassetmyheaaaaaaart.Flavor_Text:
He's not real smart
And yet, he's touched my little cowhide heart
hassetmyheaaaaaaart.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 2 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)

Banish chosen item.

iwillfindmyway.Name: I Will Find My Way
iwillfindmyway.Flavor_Text:
I would go most anywhere
To feel like I belong
iwillfindmyway.Body_Text: (A character with cost X or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)  Chosen character of yours gets +2{s} this turn. They may move to a location for free.

strikeagoodmatch.Name: Strike A Good Match
strikeagoodmatch.Flavor_Text:
Please bring honor to us
Please bring honor to us all
strikeagoodmatch.Body_Text:
(A character with cost X or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)

Draw 2 cards, then choose and discard a card.

airfoil.Name: Airfoil
airfoil.Flavor_Text: Discovered in the lost Sea Duck, it looked good as new.
airfoil.Body_Text: I Got To Be Going - {e}: If you've played 2 or more actions this turn, draw a card.

robinsbow.Name: Robin's Bow
robinsbow.Flavor_Text:
"The forest always provides just what you need."
-Robin Hood
robinsbow.Body_Text:
Forest's Gift - {e}: Deal 1 damage to chosen damaged character or location.

A Bit Of A Lark - Whenever a character of yours named Robin Hood quests, you may ready this item.

starlightvial.Name: Starlight Vial
starlightvial.Flavor_Text: In the wrong hands, this vial of magic could be disastrous.
starlightvial.Body_Text:
Efficient Energy - {e}: You pay 2{i} less for the next action you play this turn.

Trap - 2{i}, Banish this item: Draw 2 cards, then choose and discard a card.
