Show The Way - You pay 1{i} less to move your characters to a location.

mauisplaceofexilehiddenisland.Name: Maui's Place of Exile - Hidden Island
mauisplaceofexilehiddenisland.Flavor_Text: Nothing but boulders and sand - easy to miss.
mauisplaceofexilehiddenisland.Body_Text: Isolated - Characters gain Resist +1 while here. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

nottinghamprincejohnscastle.Name: Nottingham - Prince John's Castle
nottinghamprincejohnscastle.Flavor_Text:
Sir Hiss: "I say, sire, your mother's castle will be the perfect place to set up our scheme!"
Prince John: "Mommy!"

thebayoumysteriousswamp.Name: The Bayou - Mysterious Swamp
thebayoumysteriousswamp.Flavor_Text: A place to find what you need, not just what you want.
thebayoumysteriousswamp.Body_Text: Show Me The Way - Whenever a character quests while here, you may draw a card, then choose and discard a card.

bashfulhopelessromantic.Name: Bashful - Hopeless Romantic
bashfulhopelessromantic.Body_Text: Oh, Gosh! - This character can't quest unless you have another Seven Dwarfs character in play.

christopherrobinadventurer.Name: Christopher Robin - Adventurer
christopherrobinadventurer.Flavor_Text:
"Look, Pooh! Have you ever seen anything so grand?"
- Christopher Robin
christopherrobinadventurer.Body_Text: We'll Always Be Together: Whenever you ready this character, if you have 2 or more other characters in play, gain 2 lore.

cinderellaballroomsensation.Name: Cinderella - Ballroom Sensation
cinderellaballroomsensation.Flavor_Text: With a magical dress and a song in her heart, she dazzled everyone at the ball.
cinderellaballroomsensation.Body_Text: Singer 3 (This character counts as cost 3 to sing songs.)

cobrabubblesjustasocialworker.Name: Cobra Bubbles - Just a Social Worker
cobrabubblesjustasocialworker.Flavor_Text: "Let me get this straight. Your 'magic' spellbook got washed away in a flood of 'magic' ink?"

docleaderofthesevendwarfs.Name: Doc - Leader of the Seven Dwarfs
docleaderofthesevendwarfs.Flavor_Text: He's in charge of this outfit.
docleaderofthesevendwarfs.Body_Text: Share and Share Alike: Whenever this character quests, you pay 1 {i} less for the next character you play this turn.

dopeyalwaysplayful.Name: Dopey - Always Playful
dopeyalwaysplayful.Body_Text: Odd One Out: When this character is banished, your other Seven Dwarfs characters get +2 {s} until the start of your next turn.

gastonbaritonebully.Name: Gaston - Baritone Bully
gastonbaritonebully.Body_Text: Singer 5 ( This character counts as cost 5 to sing songs.)

granddukeadvisortotheking.Name: Grand Duke - Advisor to the King
granddukeadvisortotheking.Flavor_Text: He takes being opinionated to a higher level.
granddukeadvisortotheking.Body_Text: Yes, Your Majesty - Your Prince, Princess, King, and Queen characters get +1 {s}.

grumpybadtempered.Name: Grumpy - Bad-Tempered
grumpybadtempered.Body_Text: There's Trouble A-Brewin' - Your other Seven Dwarfs characters get +1 {s}.

happygoodnatured.Name: Happy - Good-Natured
happygoodnatured.Flavor_Text: You couldn't pick a better friend.
happygoodnatured.Body_Text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)

kinglouiejunglevip.Name: King Louie - Jungle VIP
kinglouiejunglevip.Body_Text: Lay It On The Line - Whenever another character is banished, you may remove up to 2 damage from this character.

mickeymousefriendlyface.Name: Mickey Mouse - Friendly Face
mickeymousefriendlyface.Flavor_Text: "Come on in- there's lots to explore."
mickeymousefriendlyface.Body_Text: Glad You're Here! - Whenever this character quests, you pay 3 {i} less for the next character you play this turn.

mufasabetrayedleader.Name: Mufasa - Betrayed Leader
mufasabetrayedleader.Body_Text: The Sun Will Set - When this character is banished, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a character card, you may play that character for free and they enter play exerted. Otherwise, put it on the top of your deck.

mulanfreespirit.Name: Mulan - Free Spirit
mulanfreespirit.Flavor_Text: Everything looks better when you're free to be yourself.
mulanfreespirit.Body_Text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)

mulanreflecting.Name: Mulan - Reflecting
mulanreflecting.Body_Text:
Shift 2 (You may pay 2 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Mulan.)

Honor To The Ancestors - Whenever this character quests, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a song card, you may play it for free. Otherwise, put it on the top of your deck.

nanadarlingfamilypet.Name: Nana - Darling Family Pet
nanadarlingfamilypet.Flavor_Text: Children are a dog's best friend.
nanadarlingfamilypet.Body_Text: Nursemaid - Whenever you play a Floodborn character, you may remove all damage from chosen character.

pigletverysmallanimal.Name: Piglet - Very Small Animal
pigletverysmallanimal.Flavor_Text: For a very small animal, he has an awfully big heart.

rapunzelgiftedartist.Name: Rapunzel - Gifted Artist
rapunzelgiftedartist.Body_Text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Rapunzel.)

Let Your Power Shine - Whenever you remove 1 or more damage from one of your characters, you may draw a card.

rapunzelsunshine.Name: Rapunzel - Sunshine
rapunzelsunshine.Flavor_Text: "We can all make the world a little brighter in our own way."
rapunzelsunshine.Body_Text: Magic Hair - {e}: Remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.

sleepynoddingoff.Name: Sleepy - Nodding Off
sleepynoddingoff.Flavor_Text: He never gets tired of naps.
sleepynoddingoff.Body_Text: Yawn! - This character enters play exerted.

sneezyveryallergic.Name: Sneezy - Very Allergic
sneezyveryallergic.Body_Text: Ah-Choo! Whenever you play this character or another Seven Dwarfs character, you may give chosen character -1 {s} this turn.

snowwhitelostintheforest.Name: Snow White - Lost in the Forest
snowwhitelostintheforest.Flavor_Text: "Why, you're all alone, just like me."
snowwhitelostintheforest.Body_Text: I Won't Hurt You - When you play this character, you may remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.

snowwhiteunexpectedhouseguest.Name: Snow White - Unexpected Houseguest
snowwhiteunexpectedhouseguest.Flavor_Text: "Nothing says 'hello' better than a fresh-baked pie."
snowwhiteunexpectedhouseguest.Body_Text: How Do You Do? - You pay 1 {i} less to play Seven Dwarfs Characters.

snowwhitewellwisher.Name: Snow White - Well Wisher
snowwhitewellwisher.Body_Text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Snow White.)

Wishes Come True - Whenever this character quests, you may return a character card from your discard to your hand.

thequeencommandingpresence.Name: The Queen - Commanding Presence
thequeencommandingpresence.Body_Text:
Shift 2 (You may pay 2 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named The Queen.)

Who is the Fairest? - Whenever this character quests, chosen opposing character gets -4 {s} this turn and chosen character gets +4 {s} this turn.

thequeenregalmonarch.Name: The Queen - Regal Monarch
thequeenregalmonarch.Flavor_Text: Don't question her. Don't doubt her. And above all, don't disobey her.

holdstill.Name: Hold Still
holdstill.Body_Text: Remove up to 4 damage from chosen character.

laststand.Name: Last Stand
laststand.Body_Text: Banish chosen character who was challenged this turn.

paintingtherosesred.Name: Painting the Roses Red
paintingtherosesred.Body_Text:
{A character with cost X or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)

Up to 2 chosen characters get -1 {s} this turn. Draw a card.

worldsgreatestcriminalmind.Name: World's Greatest Criminal Mind
worldsgreatestcriminalmind.Body_Text: (A character with cost 3 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)  Banish chosen character with 5 {s} or more.

zerotohero.Name: Zero to Hero
zerotohero.Body_Text:
{A character with cost X or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)

Count the number of characters you have in play. You pay that amount of {i} less for the next character you play this turn.

dragongem.Name: Dragon Gem
dragongem.Flavor_Text: Hope shines in even the darkest situations.
dragongem.Body_Text: Bring Back To Life: {e}, 3 {i} - Return a character card with Support from your discard to your hand.

sleepysflute.Name: Sleepy's Flute
sleepysflute.Body_Text: A Silly Song - {e}: If you played a song this turn, gain 1 lore.

arthurwizardsapprentice.Name: Arthur - Wizard's Apprentice
arthurwizardsapprentice.Flavor_Text: "Hmm.. what spell should I try next?"
arthurwizardsapprentice.Body_Text: Student: Whenever this character quests, you may return another chosen character of yours to your hand to gain 2 lore.

bluefairyrewardinggooddeeds.Name: Blue Fairy - Rewarding Good Deeds
bluefairyrewardinggooddeeds.Flavor_Text: "To make geppetto's wish come true will be entirely up to you." -Blue Fairy
bluefairyrewardinggooddeeds.Body_Text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
Ethereal Glow: Whenever you play a Floodborn character, you may draw a card.

drfaciliersavvyopportunist.Name: Dr. Facilier - Savvy Opportunist
drfaciliersavvyopportunist.Body_Text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

elsaglovesoff.Name: Elsa - Gloves Off
elsaglovesoff.Flavor_Text: The power of ice may not stop the flood, but it will help protect Lorcana.

fairygodmotherheretohelp.Name: Fairy Godmother - Here to Help
fairygodmotherheretohelp.Flavor_Text: "Use a humdrum spell. and you'll end up with humdrum magic. I like my magic to have something special!"

fairygodmothermysticarmorer.Name: Fairy Godmother - Mystic Armorer
fairygodmothermysticarmorer.Body_Text:
Shift 2 (You may pay 2 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Fairy Godmother.)
Forget The Coach, Here's A Sword: Whenever this character quests, your characters gain Challenger +3 and "When this character is banished in a challenge, return this card to your hand" this turn. (They get +3 {s} while challenging.)

fairygodmotherpureheart.Name: Fairy Godmother - Pure Heart
fairygodmotherpureheart.Flavor_Text: "We'll have to hurry, because even miracles take a little time."
fairygodmotherpureheart.Body_Text: Just Leave It To Me: Whenever you play a character named Cinderella, you may exert chosen character.

heiheipersistentpresence.Name: HeiHei - Persistent Presence
heiheipersistentpresence.Body_Text: He's Back: When this character is banished in a challenge, return this card to your hand.

jiminycricketpinocchiosconscience.Name: Jiminy Cricket - Pinocchio's Conscience
jiminycricketpinocchiosconscience.Body_Text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
That Still, Small Voice: When you play this character, if you have a character named Pinocchio in play, you may draw a card.

kuzcowantedllama.Name: Kuzco - Wanted Llama
kuzcowantedllama.Flavor_Text: "So there I was. Perfectly in control of the situation."
kuzcowantedllama.Body_Text: Ok, Where am I?: When this character is banished, you may draw a card.

madammimfox.Name: Madam Mim - Fox
madammimfox.Body_Text:
Chasing The Rabbit: When you play this character, banish her or return another chosen character of yours to your hand.
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)

madammimpurpledragon.Name: Madam Mim - Purple Dragon
madammimpurpledragon.Flavor_Text: "Did I say no purple dragons? Did I?"
madammimpurpledragon.Body_Text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)\nI Win, I Win!: When you play this character, banish her or return another 2 chosen characters of yours to your hand.

madammimrivalofmerlin.Name: Madam Mim - Rival of Merlin
madammimrivalofmerlin.Body_Text:
Shift 3 (You may play 3 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Madam Mim.)
Gruesome And Grim: {e} - Play a character with cost 4 or less for free. They gain Rush. At the end of the turn, banish them. (They can challenge the turn they're played)

madammimsnake.Name: Madam Mim - Snake
madammimsnake.Body_Text: Just You Wait: When you play this character, banish her or return another chosen character of yours to your hand.

merlincrab.Name: Merlin - Crab
merlincrab.Flavor_Text: He'll be out of this in a snap!
merlincrab.Body_Text: Ready Or Not!: When you play this character and when he leaves play, chosen characters gain Challenger +3 this turn. (They get +3 {s} while challenging.)

merlingoat.Name: Merlin - Goat
merlingoat.Flavor_Text: "He always was a stubborn old goat." - Madam Mim
merlingoat.Body_Text: Here I Come!: When you play this character and when he leaves play, gain 1 lore.

merlinrabbit.Name: Merlin - Rabbit
merlinrabbit.Flavor_Text: It was turning out to be a bad hare day.
merlinrabbit.Body_Text: Hoppity Hip!: When you play this character and when he leaves play, you may draw a card.

merlinshapeshifter.Name: Merlin - Shapeshifter
merlinshapeshifter.Flavor_Text: "Oh, blast it all - I can't make up my mind."
merlinshapeshifter.Body_Text: Battle Of Wits: Whenever one of your other characters is returned to your hand from play, this characters get +1 {l} this turn.

merlinsquirrel.Name: Merlin - Squirrel
merlinsquirrel.Flavor_Text: "You can't always trust to luck, boy."
merlinsquirrel.Body_Text: Look Before You Leap: When you play this character and when he leaves play, look at the top card of your deck. Put it on either the top or the bottom of your deck.

peterpansshadownotsewnon.Name: Peter Pan's Shadow - Not Sewn On
peterpansshadownotsewnon.Body_Text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)
Tiptoe: Your other characters with Rush gain Evasive.

pinocchiostarattraction.Name: Pinocchio - Star Attraction
pinocchiostarattraction.Flavor_Text:
"With that personality, that profile, that physique... Why, I can see your name in light, lights six feet high."
-Honest John

pinocchioontherun.Name: Pinocchio - On The Run
pinocchioontherun.Flavor_Text: He raced into the Inklands without a thought.
pinocchioontherun.Body_Text:
Shift 3 (You pay 3 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Pinocchio.)
Listen To Your Conscience: When you play this character, you may return chosen character or item with cost 3 or less to their player's hand.

pinocchiotalkativepuppet.Name: Pinocchio - Talkative Puppet
pinocchiotalkativepuppet.Flavor_Text:
"A lie keeps growing and growing until it's as plain as the nose on your face."
-Blue Fairy
pinocchiotalkativepuppet.Body_Text: Telling Lies: When you play this character, you may exert chosen opposing character.

winniethepoohhunnywizard.Name: Winnie The Pooh - Hunny Wizard
winniethepoohhunnywizard.Flavor_Text: He'd always felt a kinship with honey. They were both golden, and sweet, and likely to end up in sticky situations.

yzmascarybeyondallreason.Name: Yzma - Scary Beyond All Reason
yzmascarybeyondallreason.Body_Text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Yzma)
Cruel Irony: When you play this character, shuffle another chosen character card into their player's deck. That player draws 2 cards.

yzmawithoutbeautysleep.Name: Yzma - Without Beauty Sleep
yzmawithoutbeautysleep.Flavor_Text:
Yzma: "Llamas! All I see when I close my eyes is llamas!"
Kronk: "Weird. I just saw one in the flood. Poor little guy."

gruesomeandgrim.Name: Gruesome And Grim
gruesomeandgrim.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 3 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)
Play a character with cost 4 or less for free. They gain Rush. At the end of the turn, banish them. (They can challenge the turn they're played)

imstuck.Name: I'm Stuck!
imstuck.Body_Text: Chosen exerted character can't ready at the start of their next turn

legendoftheswordinthestone.Name: Legend Of The Sword In The Stone
legendoftheswordinthestone.Flavor_Text: A legend is sung of when England was young\n   And knights were brave and bold
legendoftheswordinthestone.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 2 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)
Chosen character gains Challenger +3 this turn. (They get +3 {s} while challenging.)

bindingcontract.Name: Binding Contract
bindingcontract.Flavor_Text: Just a standard form, nothing to worry about.
bindingcontract.Body_Text: For All Eternity: {e}, {e} one of you character - Exert chosen character.

croquetmallet.Name: Croquet Mallet
croquetmallet.Body_Text: Hurtling Hedgehog: Banish this item - Chosen character gains Rush this turn. (They can challenge the turn they're played.)

perplexingsignposts.Name: Perplexing Signposts
perplexingsignposts.Flavor_Text:
Alice: "I just wanted to ask you which way I ought to go."
Cheshire Cat: "Well, that depends on where you want to get."
perplexingsignposts.Body_Text: To Wonderland: Banish this item - Return chosen character of yours to your hand.

thesorcerersspellbook.Name: The Sorcerer's Spellbook
thesorcerersspellbook.Flavor_Text: Illumineers seek the power of knowledge - but must be aware of the price.

arthurtrainedswordsman.Name: Arthur - Trained Swordsman
arthurtrainedswordsman.Flavor_Text: "It's not just fancy horses and swinging a sword around, you know! A true master must use his brain as well as his blade." - Merlin

beastrelentless.Name: Beast - Relentless
beastrelentless.Body_Text: Second Wind: Whenever an opposing character is damaged, you may ready this character.

bellebookworm.Name: Belle - Bookworm
bellebookworm.Flavor_Text: There's nothing more tempting than a pile of unread books.
bellebookworm.Body_Text: Use Your Imagination: While an opponent has no cards in their hand, this character gets +2 {l}.

bellehiddenarcher.Name: Belle - Hidden Archer
bellehiddenarcher.Flavor_Text: She slips through the trees as easily as shadow.
bellehiddenarcher.Body_Text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Belle.)
Thorny Arrows: Whenever this character is challenged, the challenging character's player discards all cards in their hand.

buckysquirrelsqueaktutor.Name: Bucky - Squirrel Squeak Tutor
buckysquirrelsqueaktutor.Flavor_Text: "There's a lot of nuance to squirrel." - Kronk
buckysquirrelsqueaktutor.Body_Text:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
Squeak: Whenever you play a Floodborn character, each opponent chooses and discards a card.

cheshirecatalwaysgrinning.Name: Cheshire Cat - Always Grinning
cheshirecatalwaysgrinning.Flavor_Text: Alice felt quite confused. "But I don't see much ink here at all. How can the flood still be changing the Inklands?" "Things are always changing, you know," said the cat. "It would be a change if they didn't."

cheshirecatfromtheshadows.Name: Cheshire Cat - From the Shadows
cheshirecatfromtheshadows.Body_Text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Cheshire Cat.)
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
Wicked Smile: {e} - Banish chosen damaged character.

daisyducksecretagent.Name: Daisy Duck - Secret Agent
daisyducksecretagent.Body_Text: Thwart: Whenever this character quests, each opponent chooses and discards a card.

donaldduckperfectgentleman.Name: Donald Duck - Perfect Gentleman
donaldduckperfectgentleman.Body_Text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Donald Duck.)
Allow Me: At the start of your turn, each player may draw a card.

donaldducksleepwalker.Name: Donald Duck - Sleepwalker
donaldducksleepwalker.Body_Text: Startled Awake: Whenever you play an action, this character gets +2 {s} this turn.

drfacilierfortuneteller.Name: Dr. Facilier - Fortune Teller
drfacilierfortuneteller.Body_Text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
You're In My World: Whenever this character quests, chosen opposing character can't quest during their next turn.

enchantressunexpectedjudge.Name: Enchantress - Unexpected Judge
enchantressunexpectedjudge.Body_Text: True Form: While being challenged, this character gets +2 {s}.

flynnriderconfidentvagabond.Name: Flynn Rider - Confident Vagabond
flynnriderconfidentvagabond.Flavor_Text: "I love a good fan club, but they could at least try to get the nose right!"

flynnriderhisownbiggestfan.Name: Flynn Rider - His Own Biggest Fan
flynnriderhisownbiggestfan.Body_Text:
Shift 2 (You may 2 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Flynn Rider.)
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
One Last, Big Score: This character gets -1 {l} for each card in your opponents' hands.

gastonschemingsuitor.Name: Gaston - Scheming Suitor
gastonschemingsuitor.Body_Text: Yes, I'm Intimidating: While one or more opponents have no cards in their hands, this character gets +3 {s}.

littlejohnloyalfriend.Name: Little John - Loyal Friend
littlejohnloyalfriend.Flavor_Text: "What's the rush, Rob? Take a load off! There's plenty of time to go lookin' for lore lost in that crazy ink."

lucifercunningcat.Name: Lucifer - Cunning Cat
lucifercunningcat.Flavor_Text:
"There must be something good about him."
 - Cinderella
lucifercunningcat.Body_Text: Mouse Catcher: When you play this character, each opponent chooses and discards either 2 cards or 1 action card.

painunderworldimp.Name: Pain - Underworld Imp
painunderworldimp.Flavor_Text:
"Get a move on! I'm a busy god, lots to do-meetings, curses, a little light scheming."
 - Hades
painunderworldimp.Body_Text: Coming, Your Most Lugubriousness: While this character has 5 {s} or more, he gets +2 {l}.

panicunderworldimp.Name: Panic - Underworld Imp
panicunderworldimp.Flavor_Text:
"Who says it's hard to find good help these days? Oh yeah... ME!"
 - Hades
panicunderworldimp.Body_Text: I Can Handle It: When you play this character, chosen character gets +2 {s} this turn. If the chosen character is named Pain, he gets +4 {s} instead.

petebadguy.Name: Pete - Bad Guy
petebadguy.Body_Text:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
Take That!: Whenever you play an action, this character gets +2 {s} this turn.
Who's Next?: While this character has 7 {s} or more, he gets +2 {l}.

princejohngreediestofall.Name: Prince John - Greediest of All
princejohngreediestofall.Body_Text:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
I Sentence You: Whenever your opponents discards 1 or more cards, you may draw a card for each card discarded.

queenofheartsquicktempered.Name: Queen Of Hearts - Quick-Tempered
queenofheartsquicktempered.Flavor_Text:
"You know, we could make her really angry. Shall we try?"
 - Cheshire Cat
queenofheartsquicktempered.Body_Text: Royal Rage: When you play this character, deal 1 damage to chosen damaged opposing character.

ratigancriminalmastermind.Name: Ratigan - Criminal Mastermind
ratigancriminalmastermind.Flavor_Text: "I've outdone myself this time! Soon I will have everything I deserve. Riches... power... an entire kingdom at my feet!"
ratigancriminalmastermind.Body_Text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

rayeasygoingfirefly.Name: Ray - Easygoing Firefly
rayeasygoingfirefly.Flavor_Text: He may be hard to follow, but his heart isn't.
rayeasygoingfirefly.Body_Text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

thequeendisguisedpeddler.Name: The Queen - Disguised Peddler
thequeendisguisedpeddler.Body_Text: A Perfect Disguise: {e}, Choose and discard a character card - Gain lore equal to the discarded character's {l}.

tianatrueprincess.Name: Tiana - True Princess
tianatrueprincess.Flavor_Text: Finding your true self will set your heart aglow.

viranafangchief.Name: Virana - Fang Chief
viranafangchief.Flavor_Text: "I must make the hard decisions to protect my daughter, especially in this unfamiliar world."

bibbidibobbidiboo.Name: Bibbidi Bobbidi Boo
bibbidibobbidiboo.Flavor_Text: It'll do magic, believe it or not
bibbidibobbidiboo.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 3 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)
Return chosen character of your to your hand to play another character with the same cost or less for free.

bounce.Name: Bounce
bounce.Flavor_Text:
"Are you ready for some bouncing?"
 - Tigger
bounce.Body_Text: Return chosen character of yours to your hand to return another chosen character to their player's hand.

hypnotize.Name: Hypnotize
hypnotize.Flavor_Text: "Look me in the eye when I'm speaking to you."
hypnotize.Body_Text: Each Opponent chooses and discards a card. Draw a card.

improvise.Name: Improvise
improvise.Flavor_Text:
Shan-Yu: "It looks like you're out of ideas."
Mulan: "Not quite!"
improvise.Body_Text: Chosen Character gets +1 {s} this turn. Draw a card.

packtactics.Name: Pack Tactics
packtactics.Flavor_Text:
Pacha: "You want to survive the jungle? Start thinking like you belong here."
Kuzco: "No problem... Grrr, look at me, I'm a jaguar."
packtactics.Body_Text: Gain 1 lore for each damaged character opponents have in play.

ringthebell.Name: Ring The Bell
ringthebell.Flavor_Text:
"I'm afraid that you've gone and upset me."
 - Ratigan

ratigansmarveloustrap.Name: Ratigan's Marvelous Trap
ratigansmarveloustrap.Flavor_Text: Simple in purpose, elaborate in execution - just like Ratigan.
ratigansmarveloustrap.Body_Text: Snap! Boom! Twang!: Banish this item - Each opponent loses 2 lore.

baloofunlovingbear.Name: Baloo - Fun-Loving Bear
baloofunlovingbear.Flavor_Text: "The bees are buzzin' in the tree to make some honey just for me!"

bounprecociousentrepreneur.Name: Boun - Precocious Entrepreneur
bounprecociousentrepreneur.Flavor_Text: "If you see hungry faces, send 'em my way."

cardsoldiersfulldeck.Name: Card Soldiers - Full Deck
cardsoldiersfulldeck.Flavor_Text: You'll have to deal with them sooner or later.

donaldducknotagain.Name: Donald Duck - Not Again!
donaldducknotagain.Body_Text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)  Phooey!: This character gets +1 {l} for each 1 damage on him.

feliciaalwayshungry.Name: Felicia - Always Hungry
feliciaalwayshungry.Flavor_Text:
"This isn't how most cat-and-mouse games go, is it, Dr. Dawson?"
- Basil
feliciaalwayshungry.Body_Text: Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.)

fidgetratiganshenchman.Name: Fidget - Ratigan's Henchman
fidgetratiganshenchman.Flavor_Text: When a normal henchman just won't cut it.
fidgetratiganshenchman.Body_Text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

honestjohnnotthathonest.Name: Honest John - Not That Honest
honestjohnnotthathonest.Flavor_Text: "A thing like that ought to be worth a fortune to someone!"
honestjohnnotthathonest.Body_Text: Easy Street - Whenever you play a Floodborn character, each opponent loses 1 lore.

ladytremaineimperiousqueen.Name: Lady Tremaine - Imperious Queen
ladytremaineimperiousqueen.Flavor_Text: The twelfth Rule of Villainy: If you don't have a throne, take one.
ladytremaineimperiousqueen.Body_Text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Lady Tremaine.)

Power To Rule At Last - When you play this character, each opponent chooses and banishes one of their characters.

ladytremaineoverbearingmatriarch.Name: Lady Tremaine - Overbearing Matriarch
ladytremaineoverbearingmatriarch.Flavor_Text: "Make no mistake: this time I will make certain the key remains safe!"
ladytremaineoverbearingmatriarch.Body_Text: Not For You - When you play this character, each opponent with more lore than you loses 1 lore.

lumierehotheadedcandelabra.Name: Lumiere - Hotheaded Candelabra
lumierehotheadedcandelabra.Flavor_Text: When things heat up, no one can hold a candle to him.

minniemousestylishsurfer.Name: Minnie Mouse - Stylish Surfer
minniemousestylishsurfer.Flavor_Text: "This goes into my top ten most fun things!"
minniemousestylishsurfer.Body_Text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

minniemousewideeyeddiver.Name: Minnie Mouse - Wide-Eyed Diver
minniemousewideeyeddiver.Body_Text:
Shift 2 (You may pay 2 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Minnie Mouse.)
Evasive (Only Characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
Undersea Adventure: Whenever you play a second action in a turn, this character gets +2 {l} this turn.

minniemousezippingaround.Name: Minnie Mouse - Zipping Around
minniemousezippingaround.Flavor_Text: Zero to fun in under 3 seconds!

mothergothelwitheredandwicked.Name: Mother Gothel - Withered And Wicked
mothergothelwitheredandwicked.Flavor_Text: Her feelings are written all over her face.
mothergothelwitheredandwicked.Body_Text: What Have You Done?!: This character enters play with 3 damage.

mulansoldierintraining.Name: Mulan - Soldier In Training
mulansoldierintraining.Body_Text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)

namaarinemesis.Name: Namaari - Nemesis
namaarinemesis.Flavor_Text: "I don't need swords to beat you. They just make it more fun."
namaarinemesis.Body_Text: This Shouldn't Take Long: {e}, Banish this character - Banish chosen character.

queenofheartsimpulsiveruler.Name: Queen Of Hearts - Impulsive Ruler
queenofheartsimpulsiveruler.Flavor_Text: The glow of lore in the flood caught here eye. "The spellbook!" she cried. "Don't let it get away!"
queenofheartsimpulsiveruler.Body_Text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)

queenofheartssensingweakness.Name: Queen Of Hearts - Sensing Weakness
queenofheartssensingweakness.Body_Text:
Shift 2 (You may pay 2 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Queen of Hearts.)
Let The Game Being: Whenever one of your characters challenges another character, you may draw a card.

ratiganverylargemouse.Name: Ratigan - Very Large Mouse
ratiganverylargemouse.Flavor_Text: "This time, nothing, not even Basil, can stand in my way!"
ratiganverylargemouse.Body_Text: This Is My Kingdom: When you play this character, exert chosen opposing character with 3 {s} or less. Choose one of your characters and read them. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.

rayaheadstrong.Name: Raya - Headstrong
rayaheadstrong.Flavor_Text: Two parts of bravery, one part cleverness, and a whole lot of determination.
rayaheadstrong.Body_Text: Note To Self, Don't Die: During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you may ready this character. She can't quest for the rest of this turn.

rayaleaderofheart.Name: Raya - Leader of Heart
rayaleaderofheart.Body_Text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Raya.)
Champion Of Kumandra: Whenever this character challenges a damaged character, she takes no damage from the challenge.

rayawarriorofkumandra.Name: Raya - Warrior Of Kumandra
rayawarriorofkumandra.Flavor_Text: "My ba dreams of a united Kumandra. I fight to honor that dream."

scarviciouscheater.Name: Scar - Vicious Cheater
scarviciouscheater.Body_Text:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)
Daddy Isn't Here To Save You: During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you may ready this character. He can't quest for the rest of this turn.

sherekhanmenacingpredator.Name: Shere Khan - Menacing Predator
sherekhanmenacingpredator.Flavor_Text: The sixth Rule of Villainy: Keep your mind sharp and your claws sharper.
sherekhanmenacingpredator.Body_Text: Don't Insult My Intelligence: Whenever one of your characters challenges another character, gain 1 lore.

tiggeroneofakind.Name: Tigger - One Of A Kind
tiggeroneofakind.Flavor_Text: Bouncing in to save the day!
tiggeroneofakind.Body_Text: Energetic: Whenever you play an action, this character gets +2 {s} this turn.

tuktukwreckingball.Name: Tuk Tuk - Wrecking Ball
tuktukwreckingball.Flavor_Text: A good friend is always ready to roll.
tuktukwreckingball.Body_Text: Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.)

gothedistance.Name: Go The Distance
gothedistance.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 2 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)
Ready chosen damaged character of yours. They can't quest for the rest of this turn. Draw a card.

teethandambitions.Name: Teeth and Ambitions
teethandambitions.Flavor_Text: Of course, quid pro quo, you're expected To take certain duties on board
teethandambitions.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 2 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)
Deal 2 damage to chosen character of yours to deal 2 damaged to another chosen character.

themostdiabolicalscheme.Name: The Most Diabolical Scheme
themostdiabolicalscheme.Flavor_Text:
Now comes the real tour de force
Tricky and wicked, of course
themostdiabolicalscheme.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 3 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)
Banish chosen Villain of your to banish chosen character.

whatdidyoucallme.Name: What Did You Call Me?
whatdidyoucallme.Flavor_Text:
"No one can have a higher opinion of your than I have, and I think you're a slimy, contemptible sewer rat!"
 - Basil
whatdidyoucallme.Body_Text: Chosen damaged character gets +3 {s} this turn.

youcanfly.Name: You Can Fly!
youcanfly.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 2 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)
Chosen character gains Evasive until the start of your next turn. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)

dinnerbell.Name: Dinner Bell
dinnerbell.Flavor_Text: The delicate sound of impending doom.
dinnerbell.Body_Text: You Know What Happens: {e}, 2 {i} - Draw cards equal to the damage on chosen character of yours, then banish them.

peterpansdagger.Name: Peter Pan's Dagger
peterpansdagger.Flavor_Text: Like so much other lore, Peter Pan's dagger was safe in the Great Illuminary until the flood.

swordinthestone.Name: Sword In The Stone
swordinthestone.Flavor_Text: "Whoso pulleth out this sword of this stone and anvil is rightwise king born of England."
swordinthestone.Body_Text: {e}, 2 {i} - Chosen character gets +1 {s} this turn for each 1 damage on them.

alicegrowinggirl.Name: Alice - Growing Girl
alicegrowinggirl.Body_Text: Good Advice - Your other characters gain Support. (Whenever they quest, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.) What Did I Do? - While this character has 10 {s} or more, she gets +4 {l}.

basilgreatmousedetective.Name: Basil - Great Mouse Detective
basilgreatmousedetective.Body_Text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Basil.)
There's Always A Chance: If you used Shift to play this character, you may draw 2 cards when he enters play.

basilofbakerstreet.Name: Basil - Of Baker Street
basilofbakerstreet.Flavor_Text: "What an ingenious device! If its light is refracted through these, then its images must resolve somewhere below."
basilofbakerstreet.Body_Text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)

basilperceptiveinvestigator.Name: Basil - Perceptive Investigator
basilperceptiveinvestigator.Flavor_Text: "There is no question: something is afoot in the Great Illuminary"

cogsworthgrandfatherclock.Name: Cogsworth - Grandfather Clock
cogsworthgrandfatherclock.Body_Text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Cogsworth.)
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
Unwind: Your other characters gain Resist +1 (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1)

cogsworthtalkingclock.Name: Cogsworth - Talking Clock
cogsworthtalkingclock.Flavor_Text: "This has gone far enough. I'm in charge here."
cogsworthtalkingclock.Body_Text: Wait A Minute: Your characters with Reckless gain "{e} - Gain 1 lore."

cruelladevilfashionablecruiser.Name: Cruella De Vil - Fashionable Cruiser
cruelladevilfashionablecruiser.Flavor_Text: "Isn't it just gorgeous darling? And just as stylish as I am."
cruelladevilfashionablecruiser.Body_Text: Now Get Going: During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

cruelladevilperfectlywretched.Name: Cruella De Vil - Perfectly Wretched
cruelladevilperfectlywretched.Flavor_Text: "It's ink couture, darling. I wear only the best!"
cruelladevilperfectlywretched.Body_Text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Cruella De Vil.)
Oh, No You Don't: Whenever this character quests, chosen opposing character gets -2 {s} this turn.

dukeweaseltonsmalltimecrook.Name: Duke Weaselton - Small-Time Crook
dukeweaseltonsmalltimecrook.Body_Text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

gastonintellectualpowerhouse.Name: Gaston - Intellectual Powerhouse
gastonintellectualpowerhouse.Body_Text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Gaston.)
Developed Brain: When you play this character, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may put one into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

grandpabbieoldestandwisest.Name: Grand Pabbie - Oldest And Wisest
grandpabbieoldestandwisest.Flavor_Text: When he talks, even the sky listens.
grandpabbieoldestandwisest.Body_Text: Ancient Insight: Whenever you remove 1 or more damage from one of your characters, gain 2 lore.

hiramflavershamtoymaker.Name: Hiram Flaversham - Toymaker
hiramflavershamtoymaker.Flavor_Text: His creations are even more wondrous with the Illuminary's resources at his fingertips.
hiramflavershamtoymaker.Body_Text: Artificer: When you play this character and whenever he quests, you may banish one of your items to draw 2 cards.

jamesrolemodel.Name: James - Role Model
jamesrolemodel.Body_Text: Never, Ever Lose Sight: When this character is banished, you may put this card into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

jasmineheirofagrabah.Name: Jasmine - Heir Of Agrabah
jasmineheirofagrabah.Flavor_Text: She may be young, but she's got the spirit of a true leader
jasmineheirofagrabah.Body_Text: I'm A Fast Learner: When you play this character, remove up to 1 damage from chosen character of yours.

judyhoppsoptimisticofficer.Name: Judy Hopps - Optimistic Officer
judyhoppsoptimisticofficer.Flavor_Text: "I'll get to the bottom of what happened with that locked lorebook. You can count on me!"
judyhoppsoptimisticofficer.Body_Text: Don't Call Me Cute: When you play this character, you may banish chosen item. Its player draws a card.

mrsjudsonhousekeeper.Name: Mrs. Judson - Housekeeper
mrsjudsonhousekeeper.Flavor_Text: "I know just the thing. Let me fetch you a pot of tea and some of my fresh cheese crumpets."
mrsjudsonhousekeeper.Body_Text: Tidy Up: Whenever you play a Floodborn character, you may put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

nickwildewilyfox.Name: Nick Wilde - Wily Fox
nickwildewilyfox.Flavor_Text: "It's criminal how good these things taste!"
nickwildewilyfox.Body_Text: It's Called A Hustle: When play this character, you may return an item card name Pawpsicle from your discard to your hand.

noiorphanedthief.Name: Noi - Orphaned Thief
noiorphanedthief.Body_Text: Hide And Seek: While you have an item in play, this character gains Resist +1 and Ward. (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1. Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

owllogicallecturer.Name: Owl - Logical Lecturer
owllogicallecturer.Flavor_Text: "For instance, based on the quality of the light and the subtle change in wind direction, I can safely say that it is time for tea."

princecharmingheirtothethrone.Name: Prince Charming - Heir To The Throne
princecharmingheirtothethrone.Flavor_Text: He'd searched across the Inklands for the young woman who'd stolen his heart at the ball, only to find more mysteries.

rabbitreluctanthost.Name: Rabbit - Reluctant Host
rabbitreluctanthost.Flavor_Text:
Pooh: "Isn't there anybody here at all?"
Rabbit: "Nobody!"
Pooh: "Somebody's there... because somebody must have said 'Nobody.'"

sisudivinewaterdragon.Name: Sisu - Divine Water Dragon
sisudivinewaterdragon.Flavor_Text: No matter her shape, you can't mistake her heart.
sisudivinewaterdragon.Body_Text: I Trust You: Whenever this character quests, look at the top 2 cards of your deck. You may put one into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

thenokkwaterspirit.Name: The Nokk - Water Spirit
thenokkwaterspirit.Body_Text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

winniethepoohhavingathink.Name: Winnie The Pooh - Having A Think
winniethepoohhavingathink.Flavor_Text: When he though, he though in the most thoughtful way he could think.
winniethepoohhavingathink.Body_Text: Hunny Pot: Whenever this character quests, you may put a card from your hand into your inkwell facedown.

fallingdowntherabbithole.Name: Falling Down The Rabbit Hole
fallingdowntherabbithole.Flavor_Text: Down, down, down she went, floating in a swirl of ink. How curious!
fallingdowntherabbithole.Body_Text: Each player chooses one of their characters and puts them into their inkwell facedown and excreted.

fourdozeneggs.Name: Four Dozen Eggs
fourdozeneggs.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 3 or more can {e} to sing this song for free)
Your characters gain Resist +2 until the start of your next turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 2.)

launch.Name: Launch
launch.Body_Text: Banish chosen item of yours to deal 5 damage to chosen character.

nothingtohide.Name: Nothing To Hide
nothingtohide.Body_Text: Each Opponent reveals their hand. Draw a card.

fangcrossbow.Name: Fang Crossbow
fangcrossbow.Body_Text:
Careful Aim: {e}, 2 {i} - Chosen character get -2 {s} this turn.
Stay Back!: {e}, Banish this item - Banish chosen Dragon character.

gumbopot.Name: Gumbo Pot
gumbopot.Flavor_Text:
"A gift this special just got to to be shared."
-James
gumbopot.Body_Text: The Best I've Ever Tasted: {e} - Remove 1 damage each from up to 2 chosen characters.

mauricesworkshop.Name: Maurice's Workshop
mauricesworkshop.Flavor_Text: The solution you need could be just a few adjustments away.
mauricesworkshop.Body_Text: Looking For This: Whenever you play another item, you may pay 1 {i} to draw a card.

pawpsicle.Name: Pawpsicle
pawpsicle.Body_Text:
Jumbo Pop: When you play this item, you may draw a card.
That's Redwood: Banish this item - Remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.

sardinecan.Name: Sardine Can
sardinecan.Flavor_Text:
"Flight 3759 boarding now! Let's go get that lore!"
-Orville
sardinecan.Body_Text: Flight Cabin: Your exerted characters gain Ward. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge.)

beastforbiddingrecluse.Name: Beast - Forbidding Recluse
beastforbiddingrecluse.Flavor_Text: Woe to the one who draws his gaze.
beastforbiddingrecluse.Body_Text: You're Not Welcome Here: When you play this character, you may deal 1 damage to chosen character.

beastselflessprotector.Name: Beast - Selfless Protector
beastselflessprotector.Flavor_Text: "You'll have to go through me first."
beastselflessprotector.Body_Text: Shield Another: Whenever one of your other character would be dealt damage, put that many damage counters on this character instead.

beasttragichero.Name: Beast - Tragic Hero
beasttragichero.Flavor_Text: "It must be my destiny–to remain a beast forever."
beasttragichero.Body_Text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Beast.)
It's Better This Way: At the start of your turn, if this character has no damage, draw a card. Otherwise, he gets +4 {s} this turn.

benjaguardianofthedragongem.Name: Benja - Guardian of the Dragon Gem
benjaguardianofthedragongem.Body_Text: We Have A Choice: When you play this character, you may banish chosen item.

chiefbogorespectedofficer.Name: Chief Bogo - Respected Officer
chiefbogorespectedofficer.Flavor_Text: "We can confirm the ink flood was caused by an explosion. We have it under control–now clear the area."
chiefbogorespectedofficer.Body_Text: Insubordination!: Whenever you play a Floodborn character, deal 1 damage to each opposing character.

cinderellaknightintraining.Name: Cinderella - Knight In Training
cinderellaknightintraining.Flavor_Text: She's always had the heart of a champion–now she'll have the skills, too.
cinderellaknightintraining.Body_Text: Have Courage: When you play this character, you may draw a card, then choose and discard a card.

cinderellastouthearted.Name: Cinderella - Stouthearted
cinderellastouthearted.Body_Text: Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Cinderella.) Resist +2 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 2.) The Singing Sword: Whenever you play a song, this character may challenge ready characters this turn.

donaldduckdeepseadiver.Name: Donald Duck - Deep-Sea Diver
donaldduckdeepseadiver.Flavor_Text: "You go ahead, Minnie! I'm going to see if there's any lore over here."

elilabouffbigdaddy.Name: Eli La Bouff - Big Daddy
elilabouffbigdaddy.Flavor_Text: "I don't suppose y'all could whip up some more magical beignets with them inkcasters?"

goofyknightforaday.Name: Goofy - Knight for a Day
goofyknightforaday.Flavor_Text: It's a banner day for Sir Goofy, who is steeled to prove his mettle against anyone courting trouble-jouse in case.

herculesdivinehero.Name: Hercules - Divine Hero
herculesdivinehero.Flavor_Text: A good guy to have around when something wrecks your inkworks.
herculesdivinehero.Body_Text: Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Hercules.)\nResist +2 (Damage dealth to this character is reduced by 2.)

jafardreadnought.Name: Jafar - Dreadnought
jafardreadnought.Body_Text: Shift 2 (You may pay 2 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Jafar.)\nNow Where Were We?: During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you may draw a card.

jafarroyalvizier.Name: Jafar - Royal Vizier
jafarroyalvizier.Flavor_Text: "Soon you'll learn who holds the real power!"
jafarroyalvizier.Body_Text: I Don't Trust Him, Sire: During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

kronkjuniorchipmunk.Name: Kronk - Junior Chipmunk
kronkjuniorchipmunk.Body_Text: Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)\nScout Leader: During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you may deal 2 damage to chosen character.

lawrencejealousmanservant.Name: Lawrence - Jealous Manservant
lawrencejealousmanservant.Flavor_Text: In this new world, the crown could finally be his.
lawrencejealousmanservant.Body_Text: Payback: While this character has no damage, he gets +4 {s}.

lishangarcheryinstructor.Name: Li Shang - Archery Instructor
lishangarcheryinstructor.Flavor_Text: Learn what to do, then learn to do it without thought.
lishangarcheryinstructor.Body_Text: Archery Lesson: Whenever this character quests, your characters gain Evasive this turn. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

magicbroomindustrialmodel.Name: Magic Broom - Industrial Model
magicbroomindustrialmodel.Flavor_Text: Even with a hauling weight of "seriously, a lot," it can only do so much in a magical flood.
magicbroomindustrialmodel.Body_Text: Make It Shine: When you play this character, chosen character gains Resist +1 until the start of your next turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

namaarimorningmist.Name: Namaari - Morning Mist
namaarimorningmist.Body_Text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)\nBlades: This character can challenge ready characters.

pachavillageleader.Name: Pacha - Village Leader
pachavillageleader.Flavor_Text: "Don't be fooled by the folksy peasant look." - Kuzco

princenaveenpennilessroyal.Name: Prince Naveen - Penniless Royal
princenaveenpennilessroyal.Flavor_Text: All he's got is his charm.

queenofheartscapriciousmonarch.Name: Queen Of Hearts - Capricious Monarch
queenofheartscapriciousmonarch.Flavor_Text: The forth Rule of Villainy: Do whatever it takes to get ahead.
queenofheartscapriciousmonarch.Body_Text: Off With Their Heads!: Whenever an opposing character is banished, you may ready this character.

robinhoodcapablefighter.Name: Robin Hood - Capable Fighter
robinhoodcapablefighter.Flavor_Text: "Capable? You don't know the half of it." - Little John
robinhoodcapablefighter.Body_Text: Skirmish {e} - Deal 1 damage to chosen character.

thehuntsmanreluctantenforcer.Name: The Huntsman - Reluctant Enforcer
thehuntsmanreluctantenforcer.Flavor_Text: "Run away, hide! In the woods, anywhere!"
thehuntsmanreluctantenforcer.Body_Text: Change Of Heart: Whenever this character quests, you may draw a card, then choose and discard a card.

theprincenevergivesup.Name: The Prince - Never Gives Up
theprincenevergivesup.Body_Text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)\nResist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)

tianacelebratingprincess.Name: Tiana - Celebrating Princess
tianacelebratingprincess.Body_Text: Resist +2 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 2.)\nWhat You Give Is What You Get: While this character is exerted and you have no cards in your hand, opponents can't play actions.

tianadiligentwaitress.Name: Tiana - Diligent Waitress
tianadiligentwaitress.Flavor_Text: "My place is going be special, with great food to fill people's bellies and hot jazz to feed their souls!"

charge.Name: Charge!
charge.Flavor_Text: Sometime subtlety is required. This is not one of those times.
charge.Body_Text: Chosen character gains Challenger +2 and Resist +2 this turn. (They get +2 {s} while challenging. Damage dealt to them is reduced by 2.)

letthestormrageon.Name: Let The Storm Rage On
letthestormrageon.Flavor_Text: The cold never bothered me anyway
letthestormrageon.Body_Text: (A character with cost 3 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)\nDeal 2 damaged to chosen character. Draw a card.

pickafight.Name: Pick A Fight
pickafight.Body_Text: Chosen character can challenge ready characters this turn.

strengthofaragingfire.Name: Strength Of A Raging Fire
strengthofaragingfire.Flavor_Text: Tranquil as a forest\nBut on fire within
strengthofaragingfire.Body_Text: (A character with cost 3 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.) Deal damage to chosen character equal to the number of characters you have in play.

lastcannon.Name: Last Cannon
lastcannon.Body_Text: Arm Yourself: 1 {i}, Banish this item - Chosen character gains Challenger +3 this turn. (They get +3 {s} while challenging.)

mousearmor.Name: Mouse Armor
mousearmor.Flavor_Text: Built by the tiniest of hands for the bravest of hearts.
mousearmor.Body_Text: Protection - {e}: Chosen character gains Resist +1 until the start of your next turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

weightset.Name: Weight Set
weightset.Body_Text: Training - Whenever you play a character with 4 {s} or more, you may pay 1 {i} to draw a card.

kodatalkativecub.Name: Koda - Talkative Cub
kodatalkativecub.Flavor_Text: "I mean, I don't want to brag or nothing, but I got some moves."
kodatalkativecub.Body_Text: Tell Everybody: During opponents' turns, you can't lost lore.

nalamischievouscub.Name: Nala - Mischievous Cub
nalamischievouscub.Flavor_Text:
The Lorcana Hide-and-Seek Championship was
hers for the taking.

princenaveenukuleleplayer.Name: Prince Naveen - Ukulele Player
princenaveenukuleleplayer.Body_Text: Singer 6 (This-character counts as cost6 {i} to sing songs.) It's Beautiful, No?: When you play this character, you may play a song with cost 6 or less for free.

ruttnorthernmoose.Name: Rutt - Northern Moose
ruttnorthernmoose.Flavor_Text:
"Let's find some nice twigs, eh? I could use a
snack!"

kenaibigbrother.Name: Kenai - Big Brother
kenaibigbrother.Flavor_Text:
"You have to look after your little brother, no matter
how big a pain he is."
-Kenai
kenaibigbrother.Body_Text: Brothers Forever: While this character is exerted, your characters named Koda can't be challenged.

vanellopevonschweetzsugarrushchamp.Name: Vanellope von Schweetz - Sugar Rush Champ
vanellopevonschweetzsugarrushchamp.Flavor_Text:
"Look, the code may say I'm a princess, but I know
who I really am ... ."

tukenorthernmoose.Name: Tuke - Northern Moose
tukenorthernmoose.Flavor_Text: "I'd love a snack, but I'm kinda tied up right now."

lilojuniorcakedecorator.Name: Lilo - Junior Cake Decorator
lilojuniorcakedecorator.Flavor_Text:
"Peanut butter and pineapple! This'll be the best
cake ever!"
lilojuniorcakedecorator.Body_Text:
Support (Whenever this character quests, you
may add their {s} to another chosen character's
{s} this turn.)

vanellopevonschweetzcandymechanic.Name: Vanellope von Schweetz - Candy Mechanic
vanellopevonschweetzcandymechanic.Flavor_Text:
"I'll take whatever you've got... as long as it's got
sugar in it."
vanellopevonschweetzcandymechanic.Body_Text: You've Got To Pay To Play:Whenever this character quests, chosen opposing character gets -1{s} until the start of your next turn.

fixitfelixjrtrustybuilder.Name: Fix-It Felix, Jr. - Trusty Builder
fixitfelixjrtrustybuilder.Flavor_Text: "Golly, this place is going to take some real fixing!"

"Investigate every port of the Illuminary, find the

Shift 2 (You may pay 2{i} to play this on top of one of

wreckitralphadmiralunderpants.Body_Text: I've Got The Coolest Friend: When you play  this character, return a character card from your discard to your hand. If that card is a Princess character card, gain 2 lore.

maidmarianladyofthelists.Name: Maid Marian - Lady of the Lists
maidmarianladyofthelists.Flavor_Text:
"And who might you be, my knight and
champion?"

tryeverything.Name: Try Everything

(A character with cost 4 or more can {e} to sing this song for
free.)
Remove up to 3 damage from chosen character and ready

healingtouch.Name: Healing Touch

"The heart is not so easily changed, but the head can

Play a character with cost 5 or less from your

amberchromicon.Name: Amber Chromicon

archimedesexasperatedowl.Body_Text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can

may draw a card.

to... him."

Draw 3 cards, then put 2 cards from your hand on the

(A character with cost 4 or more can {e} to sing this

If chosen opponent has more cards in their hand than

rancisfluggerbutterchocolatecharger.Flavor_Text: Ingredients: Butter, sugar, unsweetened chocolate, vanilla, and arrogance.

daisyduckspotlessfoodfighter.Body_Text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

mickeymouseenthusiasticdancer.Name: Mickey Mouse - Enthusiastic Dancer
mickeymouseenthusiasticdancer.Flavor_Text: He loves to share the spotlight with a star like Minnie.
mickeymouseenthusiasticdancer.Body_Text: Perfect Partners: While you have a character named Minnie Mouse in play, this character gets +2{s}.

ratiganragingrat.Name: Ratigan - Raging Rat
ratiganragingrat.Flavor_Text: "The world's most diabolical genius should never suffer such indignities!"
ratiganragingrat.Body_Text: Nothing Can Stand in My Way: While this character has damage, he gets +2{s}.

taffytamuttonfudgecrowdfavorite.Name: Taffyta Muttonfudge - Crowd Favorite
taffytamuttonfudgecrowdfavorite.Flavor_Text: "Never lose sight of where you're going. Second place."
taffytamuttonfudgecrowdfavorite.Body_Text: Showstopper: When you play this character, if you have a location in play, each opponent loses 1 lore.

denahiavengingbrother.Name: Denahi - Avenging Brother
denahiavengingbrother.Flavor_Text: "You'll pay for what you've done! I'll track you all the way to the Azurite Sea if I have to!"

petesteamboatrival.Name: Pete - Steamboat Rival
petesteamboatrival.Body_Text: Scram!: When you play this character, if you have another character named Pete in play, you may banish chosen opposing character.

taffytamuttonfudgesourspeedster.Name: Taffyta Muttonfudge - Sour Speedster
taffytamuttonfudgesourspeedster.Body_Text:
Shift 2 (You may pay 2{i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Taffyta Muttonfudge.)
New Roster: Once per turn, when this character moves to a location, gain 2 lore.

robinhoodsharpshooter.Name: Robin Hood - Sharpshooter
robinhoodsharpshooter.Body_Text: My Greatest Performance: Whenever this character quests, look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You my reveal an action card with cost 6 or less and play it for free. Put the rest in your discard.

gastonpureparagon.Name: Gaston - Pure Paragon
gastonpureparagon.Body_Text:
A Man Among Men!: For each damaged character you have in play, you pay 2{i} less to play this character.
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)

petepastrychomper.Name: Pete - Pastry Chomper
petepastrychomper.Flavor_Text: His half-baked scheme to whisk away the food almost worked. But in the end, he got his just desserts.

arthurnovicesparrow.Name: Arthur - Novice Sparrow
arthurnovicesparrow.Body_Text: Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.)

donaldduckdaisysdate.Name: Donald Duck - Daisy's Date
donaldduckdaisysdate.Flavor_Text: He keeps his eye on the prize.
donaldduckdaisysdate.Body_Text: Plucky Play: Whenever this character challenges another character, each opponent loses 1 lore.

ratiganpartycrasher.Name: Ratigan - Party Crasher
ratiganpartycrasher.Body_Text: Shift 4 (You may pay 4{i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Ratigan.) Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) Delightfully Wicked: Your damaged characters get +2{s}.

simbaadventuroussuccessor.Name: Simba - Adventurous Successor
simbaadventuroussuccessor.Body_Text: I Laugh in the Face of Danger: When you play this character, chosen character gets +2{s} this turn.

minniemousedazzlingdancer.Name: Minnie Mouse - Dazzling Dancer
minniemousedazzlingdancer.Flavor_Text: She doesn't seek the spotlight-the spotlight seeks her.
minniemousedazzlingdancer.Body_Text: Dance-Off: Whenever this character or one of your characters named Mickey Mouse challenges another character, gain 1 lore.

breakfree.Name: Break Free
breakfree.Flavor_Text: Tink darted from the shattered lantern in the blink of an eye.
breakfree.Body_Text: Deal 1 damage to chosen character of yours. They gain Rush and get +1{s} this turn. (They can challenge the turn they're played.)

evilcomesprepared.Name: Evil Comes Prepared
evilcomesprepared.Body_Text: Ready chosen character of yours. They can't quest for the rest of this turn. If a Villain character is chosen, gain 1 lore.

dontletthefrostbitebite.Name: Don't Let the Frostbite Bite
dontletthefrostbitebite.Body_Text: (A character with cost 7 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)  Ready all your characters. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.

glimmervsglimmer.Name: Glimmer VS Glimmer
glimmervsglimmer.Flavor_Text:
Hades: "Listen, kid. If I'm gettin' banished back to the lorebook, you're going with me."
Hercules: "We'll see about that."
glimmervsglimmer.Body_Text: Banish chosen character of yours to banish chosen character.

whoswithme.Name: Who's With Me?
whoswithme.Flavor_Text: "Don't forget, the purple unicorn is mine!"
whoswithme.Body_Text:
Your characters get +2{s} this turn.
Whenever one of your characters with Reckless challenges another character this turn, gain 2 lore.

potionofmight.Franchise: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
potionofmight.Name: Potion of Might
potionofmight.Body_Text: Vile Concoction: 1{i}, Banish this item - Chosen character gets +3{s} this turn. If a Villain character is chosen, they get +4{s} instead.

theswordreleased.Name: The Sword Released
theswordreleased.Body_Text: Power Appointed: At the start of your turn, if you have a character in play with more {s} than each opposing character in play, each opponent loses 1 lore and you gain lore equal to the lore lost.

rubychromicon.Name: Ruby Chromicon
rubychromicon.Body_Text: Ruby Light: {e} - Chosen character gets +1{s} this turn.

sugarrushspeedwaystartingline.Name: Sugar Rush Speedway - Starting Line
sugarrushspeedwaystartingline.Body_Text: On Your Marks!: Once per turn, you may {e} chosen character here and deal them 1 damage to move them to another location for free.

ratiganspartyseedybackroom.Name: Ratigan's Party - Seedy Back Room
ratiganspartyseedybackroom.Body_Text: Misfits' Revelry: While you have a damaged character here, this location gets +2{l}.

kingcandysovereignofsugar.Name: King Candy - Sovereign of Sugar
kingcandysovereignofsugar.Flavor_Text: "My sweet subjects, I can without a pinch of hesitation assure you that I have never been so happy."

chacaimpressivedaughter.Name: Chaca - Impressive Daughter
chacaimpressivedaughter.Flavor_Text: "Look, look! My tooth is even looser today!"

thequeencruelestofall.Franchise: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
thequeencruelestofall.Name: The Queen - Cruelest of All
thequeencruelestofall.Flavor_Text: She'd seen what the ink could do for other glimmers. What could it do for her?
thequeencruelestofall.Body_Text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

scroogemcduckafficionadoofantiquities.Name: Scrooge McDuck - Afficionado of Antiquities
scroogemcduckafficionadoofantiquities.Flavor_Text: "The secret room should be right here! Ach, I cannot believe I paid a whole penny for this map."

princejohnopportunisticbriber.Name: Prince John - Opportunistic Briber
princejohnopportunisticbriber.Flavor_Text: "Of course I'm on the list. Check under 'PJ.'"
princejohnopportunisticbriber.Body_Text: Taxes Never Fail Me: Whenever you play an item, this character gets +2{s} this turn.

merlinbackfrombermuda.Name: Merlin - Back from Bermuda
merlinbackfrombermuda.Flavor_Text: "A little rest and relaxation will do wonders for your health, boy."
merlinbackfrombermuda.Body_Text: Long Live the King!: Your characters named Arthur gain Resist +1

pachaemperorsguide.Name: Pacha - Emperor's Guide
pachaemperorsguide.Body_Text:
Helpful Supplies: At the start of your turn, if you have an item in play, gain 1 lore.
Perfect Directions: At the start of your turn, if you have a location in play, gain 1 lore.

thequeenfairestofall.Franchise: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
thequeenfairestofall.Name: The Queen - Fairest of All
thequeenfairestofall.Body_Text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3{i} to play this on top of one of your characters named The Queen.)
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
Reflections of Vanity: For each other character named The Queen you have in play, this character gets +1{l}.

sheriffofnottinghambushelbritches.Name: Sheriff of Nottingham - Bushel Britches
sheriffofnottinghambushelbritches.Body_Text:
Every Little Bit Helps: For each item you have in play, you pay 1{i} less to play this character.
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)

chichadedicatedmother.Body_Text:
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)
One on the Way: During your turn, when you put a card into your inkwell, if it's the second card you've put into your inkwell this turn, you may draw a card.

princejohngoldlover.Name: Prince John - Gold Lover
princejohngoldlover.Flavor_Text: A villainous schemer from day to night.
princejohngoldlover.Body_Text: Beautiful, Lovely Taxes: {e} - Play an item from your hand or discard with cost 5 or less for free, exerted.

thequeencrownofthecouncil.Franchise: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs

thequeencrownofthecouncil.Body_Text:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
Gatherer of the Wicked: When you play this character, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may reveal any number of character cards named The Queen and put them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

kuzcoselfishemperor.Name: Kuzco - Selfish Emperor
kuzcoselfishemperor.Body_Text:
Outplacement: When you play this character, you may put chosen item or location into its player's inkwell facedown and exerted.

mufasarulerofpriderock.Body_Text:
A Delicate Balance: When you play this character, Exert all cards in your inkwell, then return 2 cards at random from your inkwell to your hand.
Everything the Light Touches: Whenever this character quests, ready all cards in your inkwell.

ludwigvondrakeselfproclaimedgenius.Name: Ludwig Von Drake - Self-Proclaimed Genius
ludwigvondrakeselfproclaimedgenius.Flavor_Text: "So you see, there's a dark void at the edge of Lorcana. A complete absence of electromagnetic radiation! What's it made of? I don't know! The light's just gone. Kaput!"

minniemousequickthinkinginventor.Name: Minnie Mouse - Quick-Thinking Inventor
minniemousequickthinkinginventor.Flavor_Text: This puts the Frosting Flinger 2000 to shame.
minniemousequickthinkinginventor.Body_Text: Cake Catapult - When you play this character, chosen character gets -2{s} this turn.

basilpracticeddetective.Name: Basil - Practiced Detective
basilpracticeddetective.Flavor_Text:
"This case is as good as solved!"
-Basil
basilpracticeddetective.Body_Text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)

kingcandysweetabomination.Name: King Candy - Sweet Abomination
kingcandysweetabomination.Body_Text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3{i} to play this on top of one of your characters named King Candy.)
Changing the Code: When you play this character, you may draw 2 cards, then put a card from your hand on the bottom of your deck.

donaldduckfocusedflatfoot.Name: Donald Duck - Focused Flatfoot
donaldduckfocusedflatfoot.Flavor_Text: "There's just gotta be one of those chromi-thingies around here somewhere!"
donaldduckfocusedflatfoot.Body_Text: Baffling Mystery: When you play this character, you may put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

tananawisewoman.Name: Tanana - Wise Woman
tananawisewoman.Body_Text: Your Brothers Need Guidance: When you play this character, you may remove up to 1 damage from chosen character or location.

tipogrowingson.Name: Tipo - Growing Son
tipogrowingson.Flavor_Text: "Mom, Mom! I think I'm still growing!"
tipogrowingson.Body_Text: Measure Me Again: When you play this character, you may put a card from your hand into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

belleoftheball.Name: Belle - Of the Ball
belleoftheball.Body_Text:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

merlinintellectualvisionary.Name: Merlin - Intellectual Visionary
merlinintellectualvisionary.Body_Text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5{i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Merlin.)
Overdeveloped Brain: When you play this character, if you used Shift to play him, you may search your deck for any card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle your deck.

visionofthefuture.Name: Vision of the Future
visionofthefuture.Flavor_Text: "We must repair the Illuminary before it's too late. And we'll need these devices, these chromicons, to fix it."
visionofthefuture.Body_Text: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Put one into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

royaltantrum.Name: Royal Tantrum
royaltantrum.Body_Text: Banish any number of your items, then draw a card for each item banished this way.

everasbefore.Name: Ever as Before
everasbefore.Flavor_Text:
Ever just as sure
As the sun will rise
everasbefore.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 2 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)
Remove up to 2 damage from any number of chosen characters.

hideaway.Name: Hide Away
hideaway.Flavor_Text:
Fauna: "Oh my! We dropped some . . ."
Merryweather: "You mean you dropped some!"
hideaway.Body_Text: Put chosen item or location into its player's inkwell facedown and exerted.

allfunnedout.Name: All Funned Out
allfunnedout.Body_Text: Put chosen character of yours into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

medalofheroes.Name: Medal of Heroes
medalofheroes.Flavor_Text: "You have etched in the rock of virtue a legacy beyond compare."
medalofheroes.Body_Text: Congratulations, Soldier: {e}, 2{i}, Banish this item - Chosen character of yours gets +2{l} this turn.

basilsmagnifyingglass.Name: Basil's Magnifying Glass
basilsmagnifyingglass.Flavor_Text: "I say, a piece of the Hexwell Crown!" -Basil
basilsmagnifyingglass.Body_Text: Find What's Hidden: {e}, 2{i} - Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may reveal an item card and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

merlinscarpetbag.Name: Merlin's Carpetbag
merlinscarpetbag.Body_Text: Hockety Pockety: {e}, 1{i} - Return an item card from your discard to your hand.

sapphirechromicon.Name: Sapphire Chromicon
sapphirechromicon.Body_Text:
Powering Up: This item enters play exerted.

thegreatilluminaryradiantballroom.Body_Text: Warm Welcome: Characters with Support get +1{l} and +2{w} while here.

stitchteamunderdog.Name: Stitch - Team Underdog

jafartyrannicalhypnotist.Body_Text:
Challenger +7 (While challenging, this character gets +7{s}.)
Intimidating Gaze: Opposing characters with cost 4 or less can't challenge.

simbalostprince.Name: Simba - Lost Prince
simbalostprince.Flavor_Text: "This is my kingdom. If I don't fight for it, who will?"
simbalostprince.Body_Text: Face the Past: During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you may draw a card.

rudygroovedisrupter.Name: Rudy - Groove Disrupter
rudygroovedisrupter.Flavor_Text: "The Illuminary can't handle this much groove! We have to keep the noise down or it'll fall apart for sure!"

royalguardbovineprotector.Name: Royal Guard - Bovine Protector
royalguardbovineprotector.Flavor_Text: "Hey, I've been turned into a cow. Can I go home?"

mickeymousefoodfightdefender.Name: Mickey Mouse - Food Fight Defender
mickeymousefoodfightdefender.Flavor_Text: Underestimating him is a recipe for disaster.
mickeymousefoodfightdefender.Body_Text: Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)

sleepysluggishknight.Franchise: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
sleepysluggishknight.Name: Sleepy - Sluggish Knight
sleepysluggishknight.Body_Text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

kronkunlicensedinvestigator.Name: Kronk - Unlicensed Investigator
kronkunlicensedinvestigator.Flavor_Text: "Maybe this one's a chromicon. Probably not. I really should have paid more attention when that wizard guy was talking . . ."

heiheiprotectiverooster.Body_Text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

sneezynoisyknight.Body_Text: Headwind: When you play this character, chosen knight character gains Challenger +2 this turn. (They get +2{s} when challenging.)

namaariresolutedaughter.Name: Namaari - Resolute Daughter
namaariresolutedaughter.Body_Text:
I Don't Have Any Other Choice: For each opposing character banished in a challenge this turn, you pay 2{i} less to play this character.
Resist +3 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 3.)

yzmaunjustlytreated.Name: Yzma - Unjustly Treated
yzmaunjustlytreated.Flavor_Text: "What do you mean, 'not on the list'?! I told you to always put me on the list!"
yzmaunjustlytreated.Body_Text: I'm Warning You!: During your turn, whenever one of your characters banishes a character in a challenge, you may deal 1 damage to chosen character.

kronkheadofsecurity.Name: Kronk - Head of Security
kronkheadofsecurity.Body_Text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5{i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Kronk.)
Are You on the List?: During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you may play a character with cost 5 or less for free.

Burst of Speed: During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

petewrestlingchamp.Name: Pete - Wrestling Champ
petewrestlingchamp.Body_Text: Re-Pete: {e} - Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a character card named Pete, you may play it for free.

sirectorcastlelord.Name: Sir Ector - Castle Lord
sirectorcastlelord.Flavor_Text: "Well, by Jove. Don't just stand there. Raise a glass to my son Kay . . . and may we be rid of the trickster wizard Marvin, or whatever his blasted name was."

bashfuladoringknight.Franchise: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
bashfuladoringknight.Name: Bashful - Adoring Knight
bashfuladoringknight.Body_Text: Impress the Princess: While you have a character named Snow White in play, this character gains Bodyguard. (An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

arthurwart.Name: Arthur - Wart
arthurwart.Flavor_Text:
"That boy's got real spark. Lots of spirit. Throws himself heart and soul into everything he does."
-Merlin

happylivelyknight.Franchise: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
happylivelyknight.Name: Happy - Lively Knight
happylivelyknight.Body_Text: Burst of Speed: During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

simbasonofmufasa.Name: Simba - Son of Mufasa
simbasonofmufasa.Body_Text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4{i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Simba.)
Fearsome Roar: When you play this character, you may banish chosen item or location.

docboldknight.Franchise: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
docboldknight.Name: Doc - Bold Knight
docboldknight.Body_Text: Drastic Measures: When you play this character, you may discard your hand to draw 2 cards.

petegamesreferee.Name: Pete - Games Referee
petegamesreferee.Flavor_Text: "It ain't cheatin' if you're the one makin' the rules."
petegamesreferee.Body_Text: Blow the Whistle: When you play this character, opponents can't play actions until the start of your next turn.

tugofwar.Name: Tug-Of-War
tugofwar.Body_Text:
Choose one:
- Deal 1 damage to each opposing character without Evasive.
- Deal 3 damage to each opposing character with Evasive.

whenwillmylifebegin.Name: When Will My Life Begin?
whenwillmylifebegin.Flavor_Text: Stuck in the same place I've always been.
whenwillmylifebegin.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 3 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)
Chosen character can't challenge during their next turn. Draw a card.

duckforcover.Body_Text: Chosen character gains Resist +1 and Evasive this turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1. They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

foodfight.Name: Food Fight!
foodfight.Body_Text: Your characters gain "{e}, 1{i} - Deal 1 damage to chosen character" this turn.

shieldofarendelle.Name: Shield of Arendelle
shieldofarendelle.Body_Text: Deflect: Banish this item - Chosen character gains Resist +1 until the start of your next turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

platearmor.Name: Plate Armor
platearmor.Body_Text: Well Crafted: {e} - Chosen character gains Resist +2 until the start of your next turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 2.)

steelchromicon.Name: Steel Chromicon
steelchromicon.Body_Text: Steel Light: {e} - Deal 1 damage to chosen character.

badanonvillainsupportcenter.Name: Bad-Anon - Villain Support Center
badanonvillainsupportcenter.Body_Text: There's No One I'd Rather Be Than Me: Villain characters gain "{e}, 3{i} - Play a character with the same name as this character for free" while here.

arielonhumanlegs.Name: Ariel - On Human Legs
arielonhumanlegs.Body_Text: Voiceless - This character can't {e} to sing songs.

arielspectacularsinger.Name: Ariel - Spectacular Singer
arielspectacularsinger.Body_Text:
Singer 5 (This character counts as cost 5 to sing songs.) 

Musical Debut - When you play this character, look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal a song card and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

cinderellagentleandkind.Name: Cinderella - Gentle and Kind
cinderellagentleandkind.Body_Text:
Singer 5 (This character counts as cost 5 to sing songs.) 

A Wonderful Dream - {e} - Remove up to 3 damage from chosen Princess character.

goofymusketeer.Name: Goofy - Musketeer
goofymusketeer.Body_Text:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

And Two For Tea! - When you play this character, you may remove up to 2 damage from each of your Musketeer characters.

hadeskingofolympus.Name: Hades - King of Olympus
hadeskingofolympus.Flavor_Text: "Oh hey, I'm gonna need new business cards."
hadeskingofolympus.Body_Text:
Shift 6 (You may pay 6 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Hades.) 

Sinister Plot - This character gets +1 {l} for each other Villain character you have in play.

hadeslordoftheunderworld.Name: Hades - Lord of the Underworld
hadeslordoftheunderworld.Flavor_Text: "Production is up, costs are down, the rivers are full. Time to talk expansion."
hadeslordoftheunderworld.Body_Text: Well of Souls - When you play this character, return a character card from your discard to your hand.

heiheiboatsnack.Name: HeiHei - Boat Snack
heiheiboatsnack.Flavor_Text:
"Sometimes, our strengths lie beneath the surface. Far beneath, in some cases. . . ." 
-Moana
heiheiboatsnack.Body_Text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)

lefoubumbler.Name: Lefou - Bumbler
lefoubumbler.Flavor_Text: You need a good toady to be a proper bad guy.
lefoubumbler.Body_Text: Loyal - If you have a character named Gaston in play, you pay 1 {i} less to play this character.

lilomakingawish.Name: Lilo - Making a Wish
lilomakingawish.Flavor_Text: "A falling star . . . I have to make a wish!"

maximuspalacehorse.Name: Maximus - Palace Horse
maximuspalacehorse.Body_Text:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)

maximusrelentlesspursuer.Name: Maximus - Relentless Pursuer
maximusrelentlesspursuer.Flavor_Text: He pursues his quarry with courage, discipline, and a touch of class.
maximusrelentlesspursuer.Body_Text: Horse Kick - When you play this character, chosen character gets -2 {s} this turn.

mickeymousetruefriend.Name: Mickey Mouse - True Friend
mickeymousetruefriend.Flavor_Text: As long as he's around, newcomers to the Great Illuminary will always get a warm welcome.

minniemousebelovedprincess.Name: Minnie Mouse - Beloved Princess
minniemousebelovedprincess.Flavor_Text: Wherever the princess goes, her musketeers are . . . well, they're around somewhere, probably.

moanaofmotunui.Name: Moana - Of Motunui
moanaofmotunui.Flavor_Text: "I am Moana of Motunui. You will board my boar, sail across the sea, and restore the heart of Te Fiti."
moanaofmotunui.Body_Text: We Can Fix It - Whenever this character quests, you may ready your other Princess Characters. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.

mrsmeeloyalfirstmate.Name: Mr. Smee - Loyal First Mate
mrsmeeloyalfirstmate.Flavor_Text:
"Mr. Smee is a kind, gentle soul who lives to bring comfort and aid to a twisted old villain. Now, what good is kindness like that?" 
- Peter Pan

princephillipdragonslayer.Name: Prince Phillip - Dragonslayer
princephillipdragonslayer.Flavor_Text:
