stitchabomination.Name: Stitch - Abomination
stitchabomination.Flavor_Text:
"His destructive programming is taking effect. He will be irresistibly drawn to large cities, where he will back up sewers, reverse street signs, and steal everyone's left shoe." 
-Jumba Jookiba

tekatheburningone.Name: Te Ka - The Burning One
tekatheburningone.Flavor_Text: She burns for that which was stolen from her.
tekatheburningone.Body_Text: Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.)

tiggerwonderfulthing.Name: Tigger - Wonderful Thing
tiggerwonderfulthing.Flavor_Text: "I'm the bounciest bouncer that ever bounced!"
tiggerwonderfulthing.Body_Text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

beprepared.Name: Be Prepared
beprepared.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 7 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)

Banish all Characters.

cuttothechase.Name: Cut To The Chase
cuttothechase.Body_Text: Chosen character gains Rush this turn. (They can challenge the turn they're played.)

dragonfire.Name: Dragon Fire
dragonfire.Flavor_Text: Rare is the hero who can withstand a dragon's wrath.

fantheflames.Name: Fan The Flames
fantheflames.Flavor_Text: Pretty words can move a crowd, but so can ugly ones.
fantheflames.Body_Text: Ready chosen character. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.

tangle.Name: Tangle
tangle.Flavor_Text:
"Stay right there! I mean, you don't have a choice, I guess. But still! Don't move!" 
-Rapunzel

poisonedapple.Name: Poisoned Apple
poisonedapple.Flavor_Text:
"One taste of the poisoned apple, and the victim's eyes will close forever...." 
-The Queen
poisonedapple.Body_Text: Take A Bite . . . - 1 {i}, Banish this item - Exert chosen character. If a princess character is chosen, banish her instead.

shieldofvirtue.Name: Shield Of Virtue
shieldofvirtue.Flavor_Text:
"Arm thyself with this enchanted Shield of Virtue and this mighty Sword of Truth, for these weapons of righteousness will triumph over evil." 
-Flora
shieldofvirtue.Body_Text: Fireproof - {e}, 3 {i} - Ready chosen character. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.

swordoftruth.Name: Sword Of Truth
swordoftruth.Flavor_Text: Almost as powerful as True Love's Kiss.
swordoftruth.Body_Text: Final Enchantment - Banish this item - Banish chosen villain character.

arielwhoseitcollector.Name: Ariel - Whoseit Collector
arielwhoseitcollector.Body_Text: Look At This Stuff - Whenever you play an item, you may ready this character.

aurorabriarrose.Name: Aurora - Briar Rose
aurorabriarrose.Flavor_Text:
"There was something strange about that voice. Too beautiful to be real . . ."
-Prince Phillip
aurorabriarrose.Body_Text: Disarming Beauty - When you play this character, chosen character gets -2 {s} this turn.

auroradreamingguardian.Name: Aurora - Dreaming Guardian
auroradreamingguardian.Flavor_Text: As the princess slumbered, her power awoke.
auroradreamingguardian.Body_Text: Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Aurora.)   Protective Embrace - Your other characters gain Ward. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge.)

auroraregalprincess.Name: Aurora - Regal Princess
auroraregalprincess.Flavor_Text: "They say if you dream a thing more than once, it's sure to come true!"

belleinventiveengineer.Name: Belle - Inventive Engineer
belleinventiveengineer.Flavor_Text: A little ingenuity and a lot of heart will take you far in this world.
belleinventiveengineer.Body_Text: Tinker - Whenever this character quests, you pay 1 {i} less for the next item you play this turn.

bellestrangebutspecial.Name: Belle - Strange but special
bellestrangebutspecial.Flavor_Text: "Far-off places, daring sword fights, magic spells, a prince in disguise . . ."
bellestrangebutspecial.Body_Text:
Read A Book - During your turn, you may put an additional card from your hand into your inkwell facedown.

My Favorite Part! - While you have 10 or more cards in your inkwell, this character gets +4 {l}.

chieftuirespectedleader.Name: Chief Tui - Respected Leader
chieftuirespectedleader.Flavor_Text: "You can always rely on the strength of those who love you."
chieftuirespectedleader.Body_Text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {s} to another chosen character‘s {s} this turn.)

donaldduckstruttinghisstuff.Name: Donald Duck - Strutting His Stuff
donaldduckstruttinghisstuff.Body_Text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

floundervoiceofreason.Name: Flounder - Voice Of Reason
floundervoiceofreason.Flavor_Text: "Excitement . . . adventure . . . danger lurking around every cor- AAAAAGGH!"

grammatalastoryteller.Name: Gramma Tala - Storyteller
grammatalastoryteller.Flavor_Text:
Moana: "Is there something you want to tell me?" 
Gramma Tala: "Is there something you want to hear?"
grammatalastoryteller.Body_Text: I Will Be With You - When this character is banished, you may put this card into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

hadesinfernalschemer.Name: Hades - Infernal Schemer
hadesinfernalschemer.Flavor_Text: "He's gotta have a weakness, because everybody's got a weakness."
hadesinfernalschemer.Body_Text: Is There A Downside To This? - When you play this character, you may put chosen opposing character into their player's inkwell facedown.

jasminedisguised.Name: Jasmine - Disguised
jasminedisguised.Flavor_Text: "Try to understand. I've never done a thing on my own. I've never had any real friends. . . . I've never even been outside the palace walls."

jasminequeenofagrabah.Name: Jasmine - Queen Of Agrabah
jasminequeenofagrabah.Body_Text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Jasmine.) 

Caretaker - When you play this character and whenever she quests, you may remove up to 2 damage from each of your characters.

maleficentsinistervisitor.Name: Maleficent - Sinister Visitor
maleficentsinistervisitor.Flavor_Text: "The princess shall indeed grow in grace and beauty, beloved by all who know her. But before the sun sets on her sixteenth birthday, she shall prick her finger on the spindle of a spinning wheel. . . ."

maleficentuninvited.Name: Maleficent - Uninvited
maleficentuninvited.Flavor_Text: She had no invitation-and needed no introduction.

mauriceworldfamousinventor.Name: Maurice - World-Famous Inventor
mauriceworldfamousinventor.Body_Text:
Give It A Try - Whenever this character quests, you pay 2 {i} less for the next item you play this turn.

It Works! - Whenever you play an item, you may draw a card.

merlinselfappointedmentor.Name: Merlin - Self-Appointed Mentor
merlinselfappointedmentor.Flavor_Text: "What a mess! What a medieval muddle! We'll have to modernize it."
merlinselfappointedmentor.Body_Text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)

mickeymousedetective.Name: Mickey Mouse - Detective
mickeymousedetective.Flavor_Text: Wherever the seaweed had come from, Mickey was sure of one thing: something fishy was going on.
mickeymousedetective.Body_Text: Get A Clue - When you play this character, you may put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

mufasakingofthepridelands.Name: Mufasa - King of the Pride Lands
mufasakingofthepridelands.Flavor_Text: "A king must care for all of the creatures in his kingdom, no matter their size."

philoctetestrainerofheroes.Name: Philoctetes - Trainer of Heroes
philoctetestrainerofheroes.Flavor_Text: "Ya gotta be the best to train the best. And I train the best!"
philoctetestrainerofheroes.Body_Text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)

robinhoodunrivaledarcher.Name: Robin Hood - Unrivaled Archer
robinhoodunrivaledarcher.Flavor_Text: "We never rob. We just sort of borrow a bit from those who can afford it."
robinhoodunrivaledarcher.Body_Text: Feed The Poor - When you play this character, if an opponent has more cards in their hand than you, draw a card.  Good Shot - During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

scarmastermind.Name: Scar - Mastermind
scarmastermind.Flavor_Text: "The best plans involve a little danger. Just not for me."
scarmastermind.Body_Text: Insidious Plot - When you play this character, chosen opposing character gets -5 {s} this turn.

tamatoasoshiny.Name: Tamatoa - So Shiny!
tamatoasoshiny.Flavor_Text: "Watch me dazzle like a diamond in the rough!"
tamatoasoshiny.Body_Text:
What Have We Here? - When you play this character and whenever he quests, you may return an item card from your discard to your hand.

Glam - This character gets +1 {l} for each item you have in play.

tritontheseaking.Name: Triton - The Sea King
tritontheseaking.Flavor_Text: "Isn't 'Because I said so' enough of a reason?"

developyourbrain.Name: Develop Your Brain
developyourbrain.Body_Text: Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Put one into your hand and the other on the bottom of the deck.

ifitsnotbaroque.Name: If It's Not Baroque
ifitsnotbaroque.Body_Text: Return an item card from your discard to your hand.

letitgo.Name: Let It Go
letitgo.Flavor_Text:
It's time to see what I can do 
To test the limits and break through
letitgo.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 5 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)

Put chosen character into their player's inkwell facedown and exerted.

onejumpahead.Name: One Jump Ahead
onejumpahead.Flavor_Text:
Gotta eat to live, gotta steal to eat- 
Tell you all about it when I got the time
onejumpahead.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 2 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)

Put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

worktogether.Name: Work Together
worktogether.Flavor_Text:
Pacho: "Put your whole back into it!" 
Kuzco: "This is my whole back!"
worktogether.Body_Text: Chosen Character gains Support this turn. (Whenever they quest, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)

coconutbasket.Name: Coconut Basket
coconutbasket.Flavor_Text: The coconut is a versatile gift from the gods, used to make nearly everything-including baskets to carry more coconuts.
coconutbasket.Body_Text: Consider The Coconut - Whenever you play a character, you may remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.

eyeofthefates.Name: Eye Of The Fates
eyeofthefates.Flavor_Text: You can change the future once you know what you're looking at.
eyeofthefates.Body_Text: See The Future - {e} - Chosen character gets +1 {l} this turn.

fishbonequill.Name: Fishbone Quill
fishbonequill.Flavor_Text:
"If you want to cross the bridge, my sweet, you've got to pay the toll." 
-Ursula
fishbonequill.Body_Text: Go Ahead And Sing - {e} - Put any card from your hand into your inkwell facedown.

magicgoldenflower.Name: Magic Golden Flower
magicgoldenflower.Flavor_Text:
"Once upon a time, a single drop of sunlight fell from the heavens. . . ." 
-Flynn Rider
magicgoldenflower.Body_Text: Healing Pollen - Banish this item - Remove up to 3 damage from chosen character.

scepterofarendelle.Name: Scepter Of Arendelle
scepterofarendelle.Body_Text: Command - {e}- Chosen character gains Support this turn. (Whenever they quest, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)

aladdincorneredswordsman.Name: Aladdin - Cornered Swordsman
aladdincorneredswordsman.Flavor_Text:
"Oh ho! So the street rat found a sword and a backbone!" 
-Razoul

beasthardheaded.Name: Beast - Hardheaded
beasthardheaded.Flavor_Text: "She'll never see me as anything . . . but a monster."
beasthardheaded.Body_Text: Break - When you play this character, you may banish chosen item.

captainhookcaptainofthejollyroger.Name: Captain Hook - Captain of the Jolly Roger
captainhookcaptainofthejollyroger.Flavor_Text: "A pretty sight, Mr. Smee. We'll pot 'em like sitting ducks."
captainhookcaptainofthejollyroger.Body_Text: Double The Powder - When you play this character, you may return an action card named Fire the Cannons! from your discard to your hand.

captainhookforcefulduelist.Name: Captain Hook - Forceful Duelist
captainhookforcefulduelist.Flavor_Text: He loves to make light of a foe's predicament

captainhookthinkingahappythought.Name: Captain Hook - Thinking a Happy Thought
captainhookthinkingahappythought.Body_Text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Captain Hook.) 

Challenger +3 When challenging, this character get +3 {s}.) 

Stolen Dust - Characters with cost 3 or less can't challenge this character.

cerberusthreeheadeddog.Name: Cerberus - Three-Headed Dog
cerberusthreeheadeddog.Flavor_Text: Always vigilant. Always fierce. Always fighting for the ball.

donaldduckmusketeer.Name: Donald Duck - Musketeer
donaldduckmusketeer.Body_Text:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.) 

Stay Alert! - During your turn, your Musketeer characters gain Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

gantugalacticfederationcaptain.Name: Gantu - Galactic Federation Captain
gantugalacticfederationcaptain.Flavor_Text: "Relax, enjoy the trip... and don't get any ideas!"
gantugalacticfederationcaptain.Body_Text: Under Arrest - Characters with cost 2 or less can't challenge your characters.

goonsmaleficentsunderlings.Name: Goons - Maleficent's Underlings
goonsmaleficentsunderlings.Flavor_Text: They may be useless, but they came with the castle.

hansthirteenthinline.Name: Hans - Thirteenth in Line
hansthirteenthinline.Flavor_Text: Tired of being last, he decided to cut the line.
hansthirteenthinline.Body_Text: Stage A Little Accident - Whenever this character quests, you may deal 1 damage to chosen character.

herculestruehero.Name: Hercules - True Hero
herculestruehero.Flavor_Text: "You gotta admit, that was pretty heroic."
herculestruehero.Body_Text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

lilogalactichero.Name: Lilo - Galactic Hero
lilogalactichero.Flavor_Text: "Space. That's where the aliens come from. And also tourists!"

mauidemigod.Name: Maui - Demigod
mauidemigod.Flavor_Text: When the gods gift you a boat, you take it. The boat's owner is optional.

mickeymousemusketeer.Name: Mickey Mouse - Musketeer
mickeymousemusketeer.Body_Text:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

All For One - Your other musketeer character get +1 {s}.

princeericdashingandbrave.Name: Prince Eric - Dashing and Brave
princeericdashingandbrave.Flavor_Text: "I lost her once! I'm not gonna lose her again!"

simbafutureking.Name: Simba - Future King
simbafutureking.Flavor_Text: "I'm gonna be the best king the Pride Lands have ever seen!"
simbafutureking.Body_Text: Guess What? - When you play this character, you may draw a card, then choose and discard a card.

simbareturnedking.Name: Simba - Returned King
simbareturnedking.Flavor_Text: "I'll do whatever it takes to save my kingdom."
simbareturnedking.Body_Text:
Challenger +4 (While challenging, this character gets +4 {s}.)

POUNCE: During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

simbarightfulheir.Name: Simba - Rightful Heir
simbarightfulheir.Flavor_Text: "I can't hide anymore. It's time to accept my destiny."
simbarightfulheir.Body_Text: I Know What I Have To Do - During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you gain 1 lore.

starkeyhookshenchman.Name: Starkey - Hook's Henchman
starkeyhookshenchman.Flavor_Text: A pirate must be tough, loyal, and strong. "Smart" doesn't even make the list.
starkeyhookshenchman.Body_Text: Aye Aye, Captain - While you have a Captain character in play, this character gets +1 {l}.

tekaheartless.Name: Te Ka - Heartless
tekaheartless.Flavor_Text:
Maui: "Ever defeat a lava monster?" 
Moana: "No, have you?"
tekaheartless.Body_Text: Seek The Heart - During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you gain 2 lore.

tinkerbellgiantfairy.Name: Tinker Bell - Giant Fairy
tinkerbellgiantfairy.Body_Text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Tinker Bell.) 

ROCK THE BOAT: When you play this character, deal 1 damage to each opposing character.

Puny Pirate! - During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you may deal 2 damage to chosen opposing character.

tinkerbelltinytactician.Name: Tinker Bell - Tiny Tactician
tinkerbelltinytactician.Flavor_Text: Sometimes all you need is a little tactical genius.
tinkerbelltinytactician.Body_Text: Battle Plans - {e} - Draw a card, then choose and discard a card.

awholenewworld.Name: A Whole New World
awholenewworld.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 5 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)

Each player discards their hand and draws 7 cards.

break.Name: Break
break.Flavor_Text: No one throws a tantrum like a beast.

firethecannons.Name: Fire The Cannons!
firethecannons.Flavor_Text:
Captain Hook: "Double the powder and shorten the fuse!" 
Mr. Smee: "Shorten the powder and double the fuse!"

grabyoursword.Name: Grab Your Sword
grabyoursword.Flavor_Text:
We don't like
What we don't understand
In fact, it scares us
grabyoursword.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 5 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)

Deal 2 damage to each opposing character.

ransack.Name: Ransack
ransack.Flavor_Text: Who has time to read labels?
ransack.Body_Text: Draw 2 cards, then choose and discard 2 cards.

beastsmirror.Name: Beast's Mirror
beastsmirror.Flavor_Text: Ashamed of his monstrous form, the Beast concealed himself inside his castle, with a magic mirror as his only window to the outside world.
beastsmirror.Body_Text: Show Me - {e}, 3 {i} - If you have no cards in your hand, draw a card.

fryingpan.Name: Frying Pan
fryingpan.Flavor_Text: It's a fine piece of cookware, but as a weapon it's truly stunning.
fryingpan.Body_Text: Clang! - Banish this item - Chosen character can't challenge during their next turn.

musketeertabard.Name: Musketeer Tabard
musketeertabard.Flavor_Text: There's no such thing as a lone musketeer.
musketeertabard.Body_Text: All For One And One For All - Whenever one of your characters with Bodyguard is banished, you may draw a card.

plasmablaster.Name: Plasma Blaster
plasmablaster.Flavor_Text:
"You don't have to say 'pew pew' when you use it, but it doesn't hurt." 
-Lilo, galactic hero
plasmablaster.Body_Text: Quick Shot - {e}, 2 {i}: Deal 1 damage to chosen character.

agustinmadrigalclumsydad.Name: Agustin Madrigal - Clumsy Dad
agustinmadrigalclumsydad.Flavor_Text: Falling for Julieta was the easiest thing he'd ever done.

almamadrigalfamilymatriarch.Name: Alma Madrigal - Family Matriarch
almamadrigalfamilymatriarch.Flavor_Text:
"Let's be clear, Abuela runs this show."
-Mirabel
almamadrigalfamilymatriarch.Body_Text: To the Table - When you play this character, you may search your deck for a Madrigal character card and reveal that card to all players. Shuffle your deck and put that card on top of it.

arielsingingmermaid.Name: Ariel - Singing Mermaid
arielsingingmermaid.Flavor_Text: "Watch and you'll see-some day I'll be part of your world!"
arielsingingmermaid.Body_Text: Singer 7 (This character counts as cost 7 to sing songs.)

cinderellamelodyweaver.Name: Cinderella - Melody Weaver
cinderellamelodyweaver.Body_Text:
Singer 9 (This character counts as cost 9 to sing songs.)
Beautiful Voice - Whenever this character sings a song, your other Princess characters get +1{l} this turn.

cogsworthmajordomo.Name: Cogsworth - Majordomo
cogsworthmajordomo.Flavor_Text: "If it's a fight they want, we'll be ready for them."
cogsworthmajordomo.Body_Text: As You Were! - Whenever this character quests, you may give chosen character -2{s} until the start of your next turn.

daisyducklovelylady.Name: Daisy Duck - Lovely Lady
daisyducklovelylady.Flavor_Text:
Sweet Daisy, the fairest duck I ever met
Each flaxen lock a rush of flowing gold
Her bill the color of summer sunset
Exquisite plumes, a wonder to behold

daisyduckmusketeerspy.Name: Daisy Duck - Musketeer Spy
daisyduckmusketeerspy.Flavor_Text: She has a talent for thwarting hidden schemes.
daisyduckmusketeerspy.Body_Text: Infiltration - When you play this character, each opponent chooses and discards a card.

donaldduckmusketeersoldier.Name: Donald Duck - Musketeer Soldier
donaldduckmusketeersoldier.Body_Text:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
Wait For Me! - When you play this character, chosen character gets +1{l} this turn.

felixmadrigalfunlovingfamilyman.Name: Felix Madrigal - Fun-Loving Family Man
felixmadrigalfunlovingfamilyman.Flavor_Text: Who needs a gift when you're having this much fun?

gastondespicabledealer.Name: Gaston - Despicable Dealer
gastondespicabledealer.Flavor_Text: "Yes, yes, everything will be ready. Just make sure you do your part."
gastondespicabledealer.Body_Text: Dubious Recruitment - {e}: You pay 2{i} less for the next character you play this turn.

goldenharpenchanteroftheland.Name: Golden Harp - Enchanter of the Land
goldenharpenchanteroftheland.Flavor_Text: You'll miss her when she's gone.
goldenharpenchanteroftheland.Body_Text: Stolen Away - At the end of your turn, if you didn't play a song this turn, banish this character

goofymusketeerswordsman.Name: Goofy - Musketeer Swordsman
goofymusketeerswordsman.Body_Text: En Gawrsh! - Whenever you play a character with Bodyguard, ready this character. He can't quest for the rest of this turn.

julietamadrigalexcellentcook.Name: Julieta Madrigal - Excellent Cook
julietamadrigalexcellentcook.Body_Text: Signature Recipe - When you play this character, you may remove up to 2 damage from chosen character. If you removed damage this way, you may draw a card.

maxloyalsheepdog.Name: Max - Loyal Sheepdog
maxloyalsheepdog.Body_Text: Here Boy - If you have a character named Prince Eric in play, you play 1{i} less to play this character.

mickeymouseleaderoftheband.Name: Mickey Mouse - Leader of the Band
mickeymouseleaderoftheband.Body_Text:
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)
Strike Up the Music - When you play this character, chosen character gains Support this turn.

mickeymousemusketeercaptain.Name: Mickey Mouse - Musketeer Captain
mickeymousemusketeercaptain.Body_Text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5{i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Mickey Mouse.)
Bodyguard, Support
Musketeers United - When you play this character, if you used Shift to play him, you may draw a card for each character with Bodyguard you have in play.

minniemousemusketeerchampion.Name: Minnie Mouse - Musketeer Champion
minniemousemusketeerchampion.Body_Text:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
Dramatic Entrance - When you play this character, banish chosen opposing character with 5{s} or more.

mirabelmadrigalgiftofthefamily.Name: Mirabel Madrigal - Gift of the Family
mirabelmadrigalgiftofthefamily.Body_Text:
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)
Saving the Miracle - Whenever this character quests, your other Madrigal characters ger +1{l} this turn.

mirabelmadrigalprophecyfinder.Name: Mirabel Madrigal - Prophecy Finder
mirabelmadrigalprophecyfinder.Flavor_Text: "Why would Bruno break this prophecy? Could it be something dangerous? We have to find out!"
mirabelmadrigalprophecyfinder.Body_Text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)

plutorescuedog.Name: Pluto - Rescue Dog
plutorescuedog.Flavor_Text: When you need help, his is the first face you want to see.
plutorescuedog.Body_Text: To the Rescue - When you play this character, you may remove up to 3 damage from one of your characters.

princeericseafaringprince.Name: Prince Eric - Seafaring Prince
princeericseafaringprince.Body_Text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

princeericursulasgroom.Name: Prince Eric - Ursula's Groom
princeericursulasgroom.Body_Text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4{i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Prince Eric.)
Under Vanessa's Spell - While you have a character named Ursula in play, this character gains Bodyguard and gets +2{w}. (An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

stitchaliendancer.Name: Stitch - Alien Dancer
stitchaliendancer.Flavor_Text: Moving to the music, he begins to understand the true meaning of ohana and how he fits into the family he has found.

ursulaericsbride.Name: Ursula - Eric's Bride
ursulaericsbride.Body_Text:
Shift: Discard a song card (You may discard a song card to play this on top of one of your characters named Ursula.)
Vanessa's Design - Whenever this character quests, chosen opponent reveals their hand and discards a non-character card of your choice.

ursulavanessa.Name: Ursula - Vanessa
ursulavanessa.Flavor_Text: This magic will certainly do the trick.
ursulavanessa.Body_Text: Singer 4 (This character counts as cost 4 to sing songs.)

brunosreturn.Name: Bruno's Return
brunosreturn.Flavor_Text: "I feel like I missed something important."
brunosreturn.Body_Text: Return a character card from your discard to your hand. Then remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.

firstaid.Name: First Aid
firstaid.Body_Text: Remove up to 1 damage from each of your characters.

lookatthisfamily.Name: Look at this Family
lookatthisfamily.Body_Text:
Sing Together 7 (Any number of your or your teammates' characters with total cost 7 or more may {e} to sing this song for free.)
Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. You may reveal up to 2 character cards and put them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

lostinthewoods.Name: Lost in the Woods
lostinthewoods.Flavor_Text: I'm left behind, wondering if I should follow.
lostinthewoods.Body_Text:
(A character with cost X or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)
All opposing characters get -2{s} until the start of your next turn.

signthescroll.Name: Sign the Scroll
signthescroll.Body_Text: Each opponent may choose and discard a card. For each opponent who doesn't, you gain 2 lore.

miraclecandle.Name: Miracle Candle
miraclecandle.Body_Text: Abuela's Gift - Banish this item: If you have 3 or more characters in play, gain 2 lore and remove up to 2 damage from chosen location.

recordplayer.Name: Record Player
recordplayer.Body_Text:
Look at This! - Whenever you play a song, chosen character gets -2{s} until the start of your next turn.
Hit Parade - Your characters named Stitch count as having +1 cost to sing songs.

atlanticaconcerthall.Name: Atlantica - Concert Hall
atlanticaconcerthall.Body_Text: Underwater Acoustics - Characters count as having +2 cost to sing songs while here.

theunderworldriverstyx.Name: The Underworld - River Styx
theunderworldriverstyx.Body_Text: Save a Soul - Whenever a character quests while here, you may pay 3{i} to return a character card from your discard to your hand.

antoniomadrigalanimalexpert.Name: Antonio Madrigal - Animal Expert
antoniomadrigalanimalexpert.Flavor_Text: "Once upon a time, there was a casita in the mountains with a very special family. . . ."

belleaccomplishedmystic.Name: Belle - Accomplished Mystic
belleaccomplishedmystic.Flavor_Text: The mixed ink had changed more than just the rose.
belleaccomplishedmystic.Body_Text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5{i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Belle.)
Enhanced Healing - When you play this character, move up to 3 damage counters from chosen character to chosen opposing character.

belleuntrainedmystic.Name: Belle - Untrained Mystic
belleuntrainedmystic.Flavor_Text: No matter what she tried, Belle couldn't completely heal Beast's wound.
belleuntrainedmystic.Body_Text: Here Now, Don't Do That - When you play this character, move up to 1 damage counter from chosen character to chosen opposing character.

brunomadrigaloutoftheshadows.Name: Bruno Madrigal - Out of the Shadows
brunomadrigaloutoftheshadows.Body_Text: It Was Your Vision - When you play this character, chosen character gains "When this character is banished in a challenge, you may return this card to your hand" this turn.

brunomadrigalundetecteduncle.Name: Bruno Madrigal - Undetected Uncle
brunomadrigalundetecteduncle.Body_Text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
You Just Have to See It - {e}: Name a card, then reveal the top card of your deck. If it's the named card, put that card into your hand and gain 3 lore. Otherwise, put it on the top of your deck.

camilomadrigalprankster.Name: Camilo Madrigal - Prankster
camilomadrigalprankster.Body_Text:
Many Forms - At the start of your turn, you may choose one:
- This character gets +1{l} this turn.
- This character gains Challenger +2 this turn. (While challenging, this character gets +2{s}.)

doloresmadrigaleasylistener.Name: Dolores Madrigal - Easy Listener
doloresmadrigaleasylistener.Body_Text: Magical Informant - When you play this character, if an opponent has an exerted character in play, you may draw a card.

elsastormchaser.Name: Elsa - Storm Chaser
elsastormchaser.Flavor_Text: After Elsa dispersed Ursula's storm, Anna was nowhere to be found.
elsastormchaser.Body_Text: Tempest - {e}: Chosen character gains Challenger +2 and Rush this turn. (They get +2{s} while challenging. They can challenge the turn they're played.)

flotsamursulasbaby.Name: Flotsam - Ursula's "Baby"
flotsamursulasbaby.Flavor_Text: "Now the crown and the trident are mine!" -Ursula
flotsamursulasbaby.Body_Text:
Quick Escape - When this character is banished in a challenge, return this card to your hand.
Ominous Pair - Your characters named Jetsam gain "When this character is banished in a challenge, return this card to your hand."

flotsamjetsamentanglingeels.Name: Flotsam & Jetsam - Entangling Eels
flotsamjetsamentanglingeels.Body_Text:
Shift: Discard 2 cards (You may discard 2 cards to play this on top of one of your characters named Flotsam or Jetsam.)
(This character counts as being named both Flotsam and Jetsam.)

isabelamadrigalgoldenchild.Name: Isabela Madrigal - Golden Child
isabelamadrigalgoldenchild.Body_Text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
Ladies First - During your turn, if no other character has quested this turn, this character gets +3{l}.
Leave it to me - Whenever this character quests, your other characters can't quest for the rest of this turn.

jetsamursulasbaby.Name: Jetsam - Ursula's "Baby"
jetsamursulasbaby.Flavor_Text: He snatched the trident from the betrayed glimmer
jetsamursulasbaby.Body_Text:
Challenger +2 (While challenging, this character gets +2{s}.)
Ominous Pair - Your characters named Flotsam gain Challenger +2.

luisamadrigalmagicallystrongone.Name: Luisa Madrigal - Magically Strong One
luisamadrigalmagicallystrongone.Flavor_Text: "This rock? No problem. Go get that prophecy hermana!"
luisamadrigalmagicallystrongone.Body_Text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)

magicbroomilluminarykeeper.Name: Magic Broom - Illuminary Keeper
magicbroomilluminarykeeper.Flavor_Text: Just a few barnacles away from retirement . . .
magicbroomilluminarykeeper.Body_Text: Nice and Tidy - Whenever you play another character, you may banish this character to draw a card.

magicalmaidfeatherduster.Name: Magical Maid - Feather Duster
magicalmaidfeatherduster.Flavor_Text:
"Have you ever seen anything so beautiful?" She asked, marveling at the Amethyst trees.
"No, cherie," Lumiere replied, never taking his eyes off her. "I have not."

marshmallowterrifyingsnowman.Name: Marshmallow - Terrifying Snowman
marshmallowterrifyingsnowman.Flavor_Text:
"You're very strong. Do you work out?"
-Olaf
marshmallowterrifyingsnowman.Body_Text: Behemoth - This character gets +1{s} for each card in your hand.

mrspottsenchantedteapot.Name: Mrs. Potts - Enchanted Teapot
mrspottsenchantedteapot.Body_Text: It'll Turn Out All Right - When you play this character, if you have a character named Lumiere or Cogsworth in play, you may draw a card.

pepamadrigalweathermaker.Name: Pepa Madrigal - Weather Maker
pepamadrigalweathermaker.Body_Text: It Looks Like rain - When you play this character, you may exert chosen opposing character. That character can't ready at the start of their next turn unless they're at a location.

peterpanshadowfinder.Name: Peter Pan - Shadow Finder
peterpanshadowfinder.Body_Text:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
Fly, of Course! - You other characters with Evasive gain Rush.

picohelpfultoucan.Name: Pico - Helpful Toucan
picohelpfultoucan.Flavor_Text: He spotted a mysterious glow in the mountains nearby. Could it be a missing piece of the prophecy?

ticktockeverpresentpursuer.Name: Tick-Tock - Ever-Present Pursuer
ticktockeverpresentpursuer.Flavor_Text:
"That cursed beast liked the taste of me so well he's followed me ever since . . . ."
-Captain Hook
ticktockeverpresentpursuer.Body_Text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

ursulamadseawitch.Name: Ursula - Mad Sea Witch
ursulamadseawitch.Flavor_Text: "After her, Flotsam! I can't rule Lorcana without the Hexwell Crown!"

ursulaseawitchqueen.Name: Ursula - Sea Witch Queen
ursulaseawitchqueen.Body_Text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5{i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Ursula.)
Now I am the Ruler! - Whenever this character quests, exert chosen character.
You'll Listen to Me! - Other characters can't exert to sing songs.

yensidpowerfulsorcerer.Name: Yen Sid - Powerful Sorcerer
yensidpowerfulsorcerer.Body_Text:
Timely Intervention - When you play this character, if you have a character named Magic Broom in play, you may draw a card.
Arcane Study - While you have 2 or more Broom characters in play, this character gets +2{l}.

poorunfortunatesouls.Name: Poor Unfortunate Souls
poorunfortunatesouls.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 2 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)
Return chosen character, Item, or location with cost 2 or less to their player's hand.

secondstartotheright.Name: Second Star to the Right
secondstartotheright.Flavor_Text: Lead us to the land we dream of
secondstartotheright.Body_Text:
Sing Together 10 (Any number of your or your teammates' characters with total cost 10 or more may {e} to sing this song for free.)
Chosen player draws 5 cards.

swingintoaction.Name: Swing Into Action
swingintoaction.Body_Text: Chosen character gins Rush this turn. (They can challenge the turn they're played.)

ursulasplan.Name: Ursula's Plan
ursulasplan.Flavor_Text: "With both the crown and the trident, together we would be unstoppable!"
ursulasplan.Body_Text: Each opponent chooses and exerts one of their characters. Those characters can't ready at the start of their next turn.

mysticalrose.Name: Mystical Rose
mysticalrose.Body_Text: Dispel the Entanglement - Banish this item: Chosen character named Beast gets +2{l} this turn. If you have a character named Belle in play, Move up to 3 damage counters from chosen character to chosen opposing character.

roselantern.Name: Rose Lantern
roselantern.Flavor_Text: The transformed rose made short work of the Beast's wound. But even the gentlest magic comes at a cost.
roselantern.Body_Text: Mystical Petals - {e}, 2{i}: Move 1 damage counter from chosen character to chosen opposing character.

tritonstrident.Name: Triton's Trident
tritonstrident.Flavor_Text:
"Just imagine all this power in the wrong hands . . ."
-Ursula
tritonstrident.Body_Text: Symbol of Power - Banish this item: Chosen character gets +1{s} this turn for each card in your hand.

casamadrigalcasita.Name: Casa Madrigal - Casita
casamadrigalcasita.Body_Text: Our Home - At the start of your turn, if you have a character here gain 1 lore.

ursulaslaireyeofthestorm.Name: Ursula's Lair - Eye of the Storm
ursulaslaireyeofthestorm.Body_Text:
Slippery Halls - Whenever a character is banished in a challenge while here, you may return them to your hand.
Seat of Power - Characters named Ursula get +1{l} while here.

crikeeluckycricket.Name: Cri-Kee - Lucky Cricket
crikeeluckycricket.Flavor_Text: Everyone feels better just knowing he's around.
crikeeluckycricket.Body_Text: Spreading Good Fortune - When you play this character, your other characters get +3{s} this turn.

diablodevotedherald.Name: Diablo - Devoted Herald
diablodevotedherald.Body_Text:
Shift: Discard an action card (You may discard an action card to play this on top of one of your characters named Diablo.)
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
Circle Far and Wide - During each opponent's turn, whenever they draw a card while this character is exerted, you may draw a card.

diablomaleficentsspy.Name: Diablo - Maleficent's Spy
diablomaleficentsspy.Flavor_Text:
"Keep an eye on the sea witch, my pet. Tell me everything."
-Maleficent
diablomaleficentsspy.Body_Text: Scout Ahead - When you play this character, you may look at each opponent's hand.

guntherinteriordesigner.Name: Gunther - Interior Designer
guntherinteriordesigner.Flavor_Text: "I hate to cover this trap door. It really pulls the room together!"
guntherinteriordesigner.Body_Text: Sad-Eyed Puppy - When this character is challenged and banished, each opponent chooses one of their characters and returns that card to their hand.

guschampionofcheese.Name: Gus - Champion of Cheese
guschampionofcheese.Flavor_Text: You can always rely on him when it comes to cheese.

hadesdoubledealer.Name: Hades - Double Dealer
hadesdoubledealer.Body_Text: Here's the Trade-Off - {e}, Banish one of your other characters: Play a character with the same name as the banished character for free.

heiheibumblingrooster.Name: HeiHei - Bumbling Rooster
heiheibumblingrooster.Body_Text: Fatten You Up - When you play this character, if an opponent has more cards in their inkwell than you, you may put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

heraqueenofthegods.Name: Hera - Queen of the Gods
heraqueenofthegods.Body_Text:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
Protective Goddess - Your characters named Zeus gain Ward.
You're a True Hero - Your characters named Hercules gain Evasive. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)

jaqconnoisseurofclimbing.Name: Jaq - Connoisseur of Climbing
jaqconnoisseurofclimbing.Body_Text: Sneaky Idea - When you play this character, chosen opposing character gains Reckless during their next turn. (They can't quest and must challenge if able.)

jasminedesertwarrior.Name: Jasmine - Desert Warrior
jasminedesertwarrior.Body_Text: Cunning Maneuver - When you play this character and whenever she's challenged, each opponent chooses and discards a card.

megaracaptivatingcynic.Name: Megara - Captivating Cynic
megaracaptivatingcynic.Flavor_Text: With love, there's always a catch.
megaracaptivatingcynic.Body_Text: Shady Deal - When you play this character, choose and discard a card or banish this character.

megaraliberatedone.Name: Megara - Liberated one
megaraliberatedone.Body_Text:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
People Always Do Crazy Things - Whenever you play a character named Hercules, You may ready this character.

painimmortalsidekick.Name: Pain - Immortal Sidekick
painimmortalsidekick.Flavor_Text: "We totally took care of that thing you told us to do and definitely did not spend the day in Thebes ticketing chariots and stealing people's laundry."

panicimmortalsidekick.Name: Panic - Immortal Sidekick
panicimmortalsidekick.Flavor_Text: "We absolutely took care of that thing, boss. No problems, just great."
panicimmortalsidekick.Body_Text: Reporting for Duty - While this character is exerted, if you have a character named pain in play, your Villain characters can't be challenged.

pegasuscloudracer.Name: Pegasus - Cloud Racer
pegasuscloudracer.Body_Text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3{i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Pegasus.)
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
Hop On! - When you play this character, if you used Shift to play him, your characters gain Evasive until the start of your next turn.

pegasusgiftforhercules.Name: Pegasus - Gift for Hercules
pegasusgiftforhercules.Flavor_Text:
"His name is Pegasus. And he's all yours. . . ."
-Zeus
pegasusgiftforhercules.Body_Text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

peteborntocheat.Name: Pete - Born to Cheat
peteborntocheat.Body_Text: I Clobber You! - Whenever this character quests while he has 5{s} or more, return chosen character with 2{s} or less to their player's hand.

peterottenguy.Name: Pete - Rotten Guy
peterottenguy.Flavor_Text:
Minnie: "This is an outrage!"
Pete: "No. It's my nefarious plan to steal the throne."

princephillipvanquisheroffoes.Name: Prince Phillip - Vanquisher of Foes
princephillipvanquisheroffoes.Body_Text:
Shift 6 (You may pay 6{i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Prince Philip.)
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
Swift and Sure - When you play this character, banish all opposing damaged characters.

princephillipwardenofthewoods.Name: Prince Phillip - Warden of the Woods
princephillipwardenofthewoods.Flavor_Text: He stands ready to protect his friends from any threat.
princephillipwardenofthewoods.Body_Text: Shining Beacon. You other Hero characters gain Ward. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge.)

thefatesonlyoneeye.Name: The Fates - Only One Eye
thefatesonlyoneeye.Body_Text: All Will Be Seen - When you play this character, look at the top card of each opponent's deck.

themusesproclaimersofheroes.Name: The Muses - Proclaimers of Heroes
themusesproclaimersofheroes.Body_Text:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
The Gospel Truth - Whenever you play a song, you may return chosen character with 2{s} or less to their player's hand.

torflorist.Name: Tor - Florist
torflorist.Flavor_Text:
They say that his arrangements are exquisite,
His composites and bouquets are so divine.
But when the crowds try to come and visit,
There's always quite a fight to form a line.

zeusmrlightningbolts.Name: Zeus - Mr. Lightning Bolts
zeusmrlightningbolts.Flavor_Text: "Ha! Now watch your old man work!"
zeusmrlightningbolts.Body_Text: Target Practice - Whenever a this character challenges another character, he gets +{s} equal to the {s} of chosen character this turn.

dodge.Name: Dodge!
dodge.Body_Text: Chosen character gains Ward and Evasive until the start of your next turn. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge. Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)

makethepotion.Franchise: Snow White and the Seven Dwarves
makethepotion.Name: Make the Potion
makethepotion.Body_Text:
Choose one:
- Banish chosen item.
- Deal 2 damage to chosen damaged character

underthesea.Name: Under the Sea
underthesea.Body_Text: Sing Together 8 (Any number of your or your teammates' characters with total cost 8 or more may {e} to sing this song for free.) Put all opposing characters with 2{s} or less on the bottom of their player's decks in any order.

ursulastrickery.Name: Ursula's Trickery
ursulastrickery.Flavor_Text: "How dare you double-cross me!" Ursula shouted, lunging at the other glimmer.
ursulastrickery.Body_Text: Each opponent may choose and discard a card. For each opponent who doesn't, you draw a card.

wedonttalkaboutbruno.Name: We Don't Talk About Bruno
wedonttalkaboutbruno.Flavor_Text: Your fate is sealed when your prophecy is read!
wedonttalkaboutbruno.Body_Text:
(A character with cost X or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)
Return chosen character to their player's hand, then that player discards a card at random.

hiddeninkcaster.Name: Hidden Inkcaster
hiddeninkcaster.Flavor_Text:
"It looks like it's been here forever."
-Flounder
hiddeninkcaster.Body_Text:
Fresh Ink - When you play this item, draw a card.
Unexpected treasure - All cards in your hand count as having {n}.

signedcontract.Name: Signed Contract
signedcontract.Flavor_Text:
"I would love to help you, of course, but there's the little matter of the contract . . ."
- Ursula
signedcontract.Body_Text: Fine Print - Whenever an opponent plays a song, you may draw a card.

visionslab.Name: Vision Slab
visionslab.Flavor_Text:
"Tio Bruno! What's happening to him? We have to help!"
-Mirabel
visionslab.Body_Text:
Danger Revealed - At the start of your turn, if an opposing character has damage, gain 1 lore.
Trapped! Damage counters can't be removed.

hiddencovetranquilhaven.Name: Hidden Cove - Tranquil Haven
hiddencovetranquilhaven.Flavor_Text: "Flounder, this is perfect! I can't wait to explore it."
hiddencovetranquilhaven.Body_Text: Revitalizing Waters - Characters get +1{s} and +1{w} while here.

ursulasgardenfulloftheunfortunate.Name: Ursula's Garden - Full of the Unfortunate
ursulasgardenfulloftheunfortunate.Body_Text: Abandon Hope - While you have an exerted character here, opposing characters get -1{l}.

beastwounded.Name: Beast - Wounded
beastwounded.Flavor_Text: It wasn't the severity of the wounds but the sickly substance that caused such unbearable pain.
beastwounded.Body_Text: That Hurts!: This character enters play with 4 damage.

fazhoumulansfather.Name: Fa Zhou - Mulan's Father
fazhoumulansfather.Flavor_Text: "I am ready to serve the Emperor."
fazhoumulansfather.Body_Text:
War Injury: This character can't challenge.
Head of The Household: {e} - Ready chosen character named Mulan. She can't quest for the rest of this turn.

flynnriderfrenemy.Name: Flynn Rider - Frenemy
flynnriderfrenemy.Flavor_Text: "You guys look busy-I'll just keep an eye on this lore for you."
flynnriderfrenemy.Body_Text: Narrow Advantage: At the start of your turn, if you have a character in play with more {s} than each opposing character, gain 3 lore.

goofysupergoof.Name: Goofy - Super Goof
goofysupergoof.Flavor_Text: Never underestimate the power of a Goof.
goofysupergoof.Body_Text:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)
Super Peanut Powers: Whenever this character challenges another character, gain 2 lore.

herculesclumsykid.Name: Hercules - Clumsy Kid
herculesclumsykid.Body_Text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)

herculesdaringdemigod.Name: Hercules - Daring Demigod
herculesdaringdemigod.Body_Text:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)
Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.)

khanbelovedsteed.Name: Khan - Beloved Steed
khanbelovedsteed.Flavor_Text: As silent as a shadow and faster than the wind: brave Khan, the mightiest stallion.

lishanggeneralsson.Name: Li Shang - General's Son
lishanggeneralsson.Flavor_Text: His training was unsurpassed, but it was his courage that would see him through this fight.

lishangvalorousgeneral.Name: Li Shang - Valorous General
lishangvalorousgeneral.Body_Text:
Shift: Discard a character card (You may discard a character card to play this on top of one of your characters name Li Shang.)
Lead the Charge: Your characters with 4{s} or more get +1{l}.

lumierefieryfriend.Name: Lumiere - Fiery Friend
lumierefieryfriend.Flavor_Text: "The invaders are at out gates, mes amis! It's time to show them what we're made of."
lumierefieryfriend.Body_Text: Fervent Address: Your other characters get +1{s}.

mulanelitearcher.Name: Mulan - Elite Archer
mulanelitearcher.Body_Text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5{i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Mulan.)
Straight Shooter: When you play this character, if you used Shift to play her, she gets +3{s} this turn.
Triple Shot: During your turn, whenever this character deals damage to another character in a challenge, deal the same amount of damage to up to 2 other chosen characters.

mulanenemyofentanglement.Name: Mulan - Enemy of Entanglement
mulanenemyofentanglement.Flavor_Text: Ursula's messengers fled leaving behind tendrils of dark ink.
mulanenemyofentanglement.Body_Text: Time To Shine: Whenever you play an action, this character gets +2{s} this turn.

mulaninjuredsoldier.Name: Mulan - Injured Soldier
mulaninjuredsoldier.Body_Text: Battle Wound - This character enters play with 2 damage.

namaariheiroffang.Name: Namaari - Heir of Fang
namaariheiroffang.Body_Text: Two-Weapon Fighting: During your turn, whenever this character deals damage to another  character in a challenge, you may deal the same amount of damage to another chosen character.

nessusriverguardian.Name: Nessus - River guardian
nessusriverguardian.Flavor_Text: He sent the eels away when they came with the sea witch's offer. He didn't need her help making trouble.

noiacrobaticbaby.Name: Noi - Acrobatic Baby
noiacrobaticbaby.Flavor_Text: Fortune favors the bold-no matter how small.
noiacrobaticbaby.Body_Text: Fancy Footwork: Whenever you play an action, this character takes no damage from challenge this turn.

pegasusflyingsteed.Name: Pegasus - Flying Steed
pegasusflyingsteed.Flavor_Text:
"He zigs, he zags - what else do ya need?"
-Phil
pegasusflyingsteed.Body_Text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

rayafierceprotector.Name: Raya - Fierce Protector
rayafierceprotector.Body_Text: Don't Cross Me: Whenever this character challenges another character, gain 1 lore for each other damaged character you have in play.

rayaguardianofthedragongem.Name: Raya - Guardian of the Dragon Gem
rayaguardianofthedragongem.Flavor_Text: "There are too many of them for me. But no for us."
rayaguardianofthedragongem.Body_Text: We Have Come Together: When you play this character, ready chosen character of yours at a  location. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.

sisudaringvisitor.Name: Sisu - Daring Visitor
sisudaringvisitor.Flavor_Text: "Come on - what's the worst that can happen?"
sisudaringvisitor.Body_Text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
Bring On The Heat!: When you play this character, banish chosen opposing character with 1{s} or less.

sisuemboldenedwarrior.Name: Sisu - Emboldened Warrior
sisuemboldenedwarrior.Flavor_Text: Sometimes the only way to fight the unimaginable is with the incredible.
sisuemboldenedwarrior.Body_Text: Surge of Power: This character gets +1{s} for each card in opponents' hands.

sisuempoweredsibling.Name: Sisu - Empowered Sibling
sisuempoweredsibling.Body_Text:
Shift 6 (You may pay 6{i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Sisu.)
I Got This!: When you play this character, banish all opposing characters with 2{s} or less.

tongsurvivor.Name: Tong - Survivor
tongsurvivor.Flavor_Text: "I too wish to join the fellowship of Druun butt-kickery."
tongsurvivor.Body_Text: Reckless (This character can't quest and must attack each turn if able.)

tuktuklivelypartner.Name: Tuk Tuk - Lively Partner
tuktuklivelypartner.Body_Text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
On a Roll: When you play this character, you may move him and one of your other characters to the same location for free. The other characters get +2{s} this turn.

apirateslife.Name: A Pirate's Life
apirateslife.Flavor_Text:
Give me a career
as a buccaneer
apirateslife.Body_Text:
Sing Together 6 (Any number of you or your teammates' characters with total cost 6 or more may {e} to sing this song for free.)
Each opponent loses 2 lore. You gain 2 lore.

bekingundisputed.Name: Be King Undisputed
bekingundisputed.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 4 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)
Each opponent chooses and banishes one of their characters.

brawl.Name: Brawl
brawl.Flavor_Text: There are two ways to leave the Snuggly Duckling - the door or the window.
brawl.Body_Text: Banish chosen character with 2{s} or less.

imperialproclamation.Name: Imperial Proclamation
imperialproclamation.Flavor_Text:
"By order of the Emperor, one man from every family must serve in the Imperial Army."
- Chi Fu
imperialproclamation.Body_Text: Call To The Front: Whenever one of your characters challenge another character, you may pay 1{i} less for the next character you play this turn.

medallionweights.Name: Medallion Weights
medallionweights.Body_Text: Discipline And Strength: {e}, 2{i} - Chosen character gets +2 {s} this turn. Whenever they challenge another character this turn, you may draw a card.

theplank.Name: The Plank
theplank.Body_Text:
Walk!: 2{i}, Banish this item - Choose one:
• Banish chosen Hero character.
• Ready chosen Villain character. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.

vitalisphere.Name: Vitalisphere
vitalisphere.Body_Text: Extract of Ruby: 1{i}, Banish this item - Chosen character gains Rush and gets +2{s} this turn. (They can challenge the turn they're played.)

snugglyducklingdisreputablepub.Name: Snuggly Duckling - Disreputable Pub
snugglyducklingdisreputablepub.Body_Text: Routine Ruckus: Whenever a character with 3{s} or more challenge another character while here, gain 1 lore. If the challenging character has 6{s} or more, gain 3 lore instead.

traininggroundsimpossiblepillar.Name: Training Grounds - Impossible Pillar
traininggroundsimpossiblepillar.Body_Text: Strength of Mind: 1{i} - Chosen character here gets +1{s} this turn.

annabravingthestorm.Name: Anna - Braving the Storm
annabravingthestorm.Flavor_Text: After talking to Olaf, Anna marched into the unexpected storm to save Kristoff.
annabravingthestorm.Body_Text: I Was Born Ready: If you have another Hero character in play, this character gets +1{l}.

annatruehearted.Name: Anna - True-Hearted
annatruehearted.Flavor_Text: Make sure you know what's truly important and be willing to fight for it.
annatruehearted.Body_Text: Let Me Help You: Whenever this character quests, your other Hero characters get +1{l} this turn.

arieltreasurecollector.Name: Ariel - Treasure Collector
arieltreasurecollector.Body_Text:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
The Girl Who Has Everything: While you have more items in play than each opponent, this character gets +2{l}.

auroraloreguardian.Name: Aurora - Lore Guardian
auroraloreguardian.Body_Text:
Shift 2 (You may pay 2 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Aurora.)
Preserver: Opponents can't choose your items for abilities or effects.
Royal Inventory: {e} one of your items - Look at the top card of your deck and put it on either the top or the bottom of your deck.

auroratranquilprincess.Name: Aurora - Tranquil Princess
auroratranquilprincess.Flavor_Text: Her music fills the Illuminary's gardens with joy and light
auroratranquilprincess.Body_Text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

danghutalonchief.Name: Dang Hu - Talon Chief
danghutalonchief.Flavor_Text: You can find villainy in the most unexpected places.
danghutalonchief.Body_Text: You Better Talk Fast: Your other Villain characters gain Support. (Whenever they quest, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)

falimulansmother.Name: Fa Li - Mulan's Mother
falimulansmother.Flavor_Text: When far from home, Mulan often thinks of her calming presence.

floundercollectorscompanion.Name: Flounder - Collector's Companion
floundercollectorscompanion.Flavor_Text: "Ariel, Ariel! You won't believe what I found!"
floundercollectorscompanion.Body_Text:
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)
I'm Not a Guppy: If you have a character named Ariel in play, you may pay 1 {i} less to play this character.

hadesmeticulousplotter.Name: Hades - Meticulous Plotter
hadesmeticulousplotter.Flavor_Text: "This neat little scheme has Ursula's tentacles all over it. That sneaky sea witch... Wait! I can use this. She can keep those obnoxious Illumineers busy while I roll out my own plan."

hansnoblescoundrel.Name: Hans - Noble Scoundrel
hansnoblescoundrel.Flavor_Text: Hans was confident he could bring Anna to Ursula - all he needed was something of Kristoff's to lure her in.
hansnoblescoundrel.Body_Text: Royal Schemes: When you play this character, if a Princess or Queen character is in play, gain 1 lore.

idunacaringmother.Name: Iduna - Caring Mother
idunacaringmother.Flavor_Text:
"Come my darling, homeward bound
When all is lost, then all is found."
idunacaringmother.Body_Text: Enduring Love: When this character is banished, you may put this card into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

johnsilverterroroftherealm.Name: John Silver - Terror of the Realm
johnsilverterroroftherealm.Flavor_Text: "Strange things be at the edge of the map: sea witches, entangled glimmers, and whatnot. I'll stay with me ship, thank you."

olafcarrotenthusiast.Name: Olaf - Carrot Enthusiast
olafcarrotenthusiast.Body_Text:
Shift: Discard an item card (You may discard an item card to play this on top of one of your characters named Olaf.)
Carrots All Around!: Whenever he quests, each of your other characters gets +{s} equal to this character's {s} this turn.

olaftrustingcompanion.Name: Olaf - Trusting Companion
olaftrustingcompanion.Flavor_Text: "Isn't this Kristoff's hat? If he went this way, he'll be caught in that storm!"
olaftrustingcompanion.Body_Text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)

pascalinquisitivepet.Name: Pascal - Inquisitive Pet
pascalinquisitivepet.Flavor_Text: If you want to find something hidden, get someone who's an expert at hiding.
pascalinquisitivepet.Body_Text: Colorful Tactics: When you play this character, look at the top 3 cards of your deck and put them back in any order.

princephillipgallantdefender.Name: Prince Phillip - Gallant Defender
princephillipgallantdefender.Body_Text:
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)
Best Defense: Whenever one of your characters is chosen for Support, they gain Resist +1 this turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

rapunzelappreciativeartist.Name: Rapunzel - Appreciative Artist
rapunzelappreciativeartist.Flavor_Text: "Pascal! A new flower for the wall!"
rapunzelappreciativeartist.Body_Text: Perceptive Partner: While you have a character named Pascal in play, this character gains Ward. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge.)

scuttleexpertonhumans.Name: Scuttle - Expert on Humans
scuttleexpertonhumans.Flavor_Text: "Wow. This is special. This is very, very unusual."
scuttleexpertonhumans.Body_Text: let Me See: When you play this character, look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal an item card and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

sisuwisefriend.Name: Sisu - Wise Friend
sisuwisefriend.Flavor_Text: "It may feel impossible, but sometimes, you just have to take the first step, even before you're ready."

thequeendiviner.Franchise: Snow White and the Seven Dwarves
thequeendiviner.Name: The Queen - Diviner
thequeendiviner.Body_Text: Consult the Spellbook: {e} - Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal an item card and put it into your hand. If that item costs 3 or less, you may play it for free instead and it enters play exerted. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

transformedchefcastlestove.Name: Transformed Chef - Castle Stove
transformedchefcastlestove.Flavor_Text:
"A good, hot meal will set you right as rain."
 - Mrs. Potts
transformedchefcastlestove.Body_Text: A Culinary Masterpiece: When you play this character, remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.

tritonchampionofatlantica.Name: Triton - Champion of Atlantica
tritonchampionofatlantica.Body_Text:
Shift 6 (You may pay 6 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Triton.)
Imposing Presence: Opposing characters get -1 {s} for each location you have in play.

tritondiscerningking.Name: Triton - Discerning King
tritondiscerningking.Flavor_Text: "If this is the only way, so be it."
tritondiscerningking.Body_Text: Consign to the Depths: {e}, Banish one of your items - Gain 3 lore.

tritonyoungprince.Name: Triton - Young Prince
tritonyoungprince.Body_Text:
Superior Swimmer: During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)
Keeper of Atlantica: Whenever one of your locations is banished, you may put that card into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

tuktukcuriouspartner.Name: Tuk Tuk - Curious Partner
tuktukcuriouspartner.Flavor_Text:
"Some say he's easily distracted. They're not wrong..."
 - Raya

digalittledeeper.Name: Dig a Little Deeper
digalittledeeper.Body_Text:
Sing Together 8 (Any number of your or your teammates' characters with total cost 8 or more may {e} to sing this song for free.)
Look at the top 7 cards of your deck. Put 2 into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

glean.Name: Glean
glean.Flavor_Text: "This could be just the thing I need to get my invention working."
glean.Body_Text: Banish chosen item. Its player gains 2 lore.

seldomalltheyseem.Name: Seldom All They Seem
seldomalltheyseem.Flavor_Text:
I know you
I walked with you once upon a dream
seldomalltheyseem.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 2 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)
Chosen character gets -3 {s} this turn.

treasuresuntold.Name: Treasures Untold
treasuresuntold.Flavor_Text: How many wonders can one cavern hold?
treasuresuntold.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 6 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)
Return up to 2 item cards from your discard into your hand.

fieldofice.Name: Field of Ice
fieldofice.Body_Text: Icy Defense: Whenever your play a character, they gain Resist +1 until the start of your next turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

greatstonedragon.Name: Great Stone Dragon
greatstonedragon.Body_Text:
Asleep: This item enters play exerted.
Awaken: {e} - Put a character card from your discard into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

iceblock.Name: Ice Block
iceblock.Flavor_Text: Frozen ink can be harvested and processed to many useful ends.
iceblock.Body_Text: Chilly Labor: {e} - Chosen character gets -1 {s} this turn.

arielsgrottoasecretplace.Name: Ariel's Grotto - A Secret Place
arielsgrottoasecretplace.Body_Text: Treasure Trove: While you have 3 or more items in play, this location gets +2 {l}.

wintercampmedicaltent.Name: Winter Camp - Medical Tent
wintercampmedicaltent.Body_Text: Help the Wounded: Whenever a character quests while here, remove up to 2 damage from them. If they're a Hero character, remove up to 4 damage instead.

aladdinbraverescuer.Name: Aladdin - Brave Rescuer
aladdinbraverescuer.Body_Text:
Shift: Discard a location card (You may discard a location card to play this on top of one of your characters named Aladdin.)
Crashing Though: Whenever this character quests, you may banish chosen item.

aladdinresoluteswordsman.Name: Aladdin - Resolute Swordsman
aladdinresoluteswordsman.Flavor_Text: "How about we cut to the part where I make a quick escape and you yell after me? No? Can't say I didn't give you a chance."

argesthecyclops.Name: Arges - The Cyclops
argesthecyclops.Flavor_Text:
"Looks like you got some big feelings there, buddy - let's stomp 'em out!"
 -Hades

arieldeterminedmermaid.Name: Ariel - Determined Mermaid
arieldeterminedmermaid.Flavor_Text: Everything she's ever wanted is almost in reach
arieldeterminedmermaid.Body_Text: I Want More: Whenever you play a song, you may draw a card, then choose and discard a card.

arielsonicwarrior.Name: Ariel - Sonic Warrior
arielsonicwarrior.Body_Text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4{i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Ariel.)
Amplified Voice: Whenever you play a song, you may pay 2{i} to deal 3 damage to chosen character.

beastthickskinned.Name: Beast - Thick-Skinned
beastthickskinned.Flavor_Text: He's even tougher than he looks.
beastthickskinned.Body_Text: Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)

chifuimperialadvisor.Name: Chi-Fu - Imperial Advisor
chifuimperialadvisor.Flavor_Text: "You there! Keep that fighting away from here! It is imperative that I write to the Emperor."
chifuimperialadvisor.Body_Text: Overly Cautious: While this character has no damage, he gets +2{l}.

chienpoimperialsoldier.Name: Chien-Po - Imperial Soldier
chienpoimperialsoldier.Body_Text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

donaldduckbuccaneer.Name: Donald Duck - Buccaneer
donaldduckbuccaneer.Flavor_Text: Nobody stands a change against the daring duck of the high seas!
donaldduckbuccaneer.Body_Text: Boarding Party: During your turn, whenever this character banishes a character in a challenge, your other characters get +1 {l} this turn.

herculesbelovedhero.Name: Hercules - Beloved Hero
herculesbelovedhero.Body_Text:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges on of your characters must chose one with Bodyguard if able.)
Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1)

lefouopportunisticflunky.Name: Lefou - Opportunistic Flunky
lefouopportunisticflunky.Body_Text: I Learned From the Best: During your turn, you may play this character for free if an opposing character was banished in a challenge this turn.

lishangimperialcaptain.Name: Li Shang - Imperial Captain
lishangimperialcaptain.Flavor_Text: Immovable as a mountain and fierce as a dragon- the Empire's finest warrior.

lingimperialsoldier.Name: Ling - Imperial Soldier
lingimperialsoldier.Flavor_Text: A good friend is handy in a fight.
lingimperialsoldier.Body_Text: Full of Spirit: Your Hero characters get +1{s}.

luisamadrigalrockofthefamily.Name: Luisa Madrigal - Rock of the Family
luisamadrigalrockofthefamily.Flavor_Text: There's no way Ursula's creatures are getting to that donkey.
luisamadrigalrockofthefamily.Body_Text: I'm the Strong One: While you have another character in play, this character gets +2{s}.

magicbroomaerialcleaner.Name: Magic Broom - Aerial Cleaner
magicbroomaerialcleaner.Flavor_Text: It spends its days keeping the treasured glimmers in the Hall of Lorcana sparkling clean.
magicbroomaerialcleaner.Body_Text: Winged for a Day: During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

magicbroombrigadecommander.Name: Magic Broom - Brigade Commander
magicbroombrigadecommander.Body_Text:
Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)
Army of Brooms: This character gets +2{s} for each other character named Magic Broom you have in play

mickeymouseplayfulsorcerer.Name: Mickey Mouse - Playful Sorcerer
mickeymouseplayfulsorcerer.Body_Text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3{i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Mickey Mouse.)
Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)
Sweep Away: When you play this character, deal damage to chosen character equal to the number of Broom characters you have in play.

mickeymousestandardbearer.Name: Mickey Mouse - Standard Bearer
mickeymousestandardbearer.Flavor_Text: He set the standard for intrepid adventurers everywhere.
mickeymousestandardbearer.Body_Text: Stand Strong: When you play this character, chosen character gains Challenger +2 this turn. (They gain +2{s} while challenging.)

mulanarmoredfighter.Name: Mulan - Armored Fighter
mulanarmoredfighter.Flavor_Text: "Maybe what I really wanted was to prove I could do things right, so when I looked in a mirror, I'd see someone worthwhile."

philoctetesnononsenseinstructor.Name: Philoctetes - No-Nonsense Instructor
philoctetesnononsenseinstructor.Body_Text:
You Gotta Stay Focused: Your Hero characters gain Challenger +1 (They get +1{s} while challenging)
Shameless Promoter: Whenever you play a Hero character, gain 1 lore.

pigletsturdyswordsman.Name: Piglet - Sturdy Swordsman
pigletsturdyswordsman.Body_Text:
Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)
Not So Small Anymore: While you have no cards in your hand, this character can challenge ready characters.

rajahroyalprotector.Name: Rajah - Royal Protector
rajahroyalprotector.Flavor_Text: As regal as his namesake and just as powerful
rajahroyalprotector.Body_Text: Steady Gaze: While you have no cards in your hand, characters with cost 4 or less can't  challenge this character.

rayaunstoppableforce.Name: Raya - Unstoppable Force
rayaunstoppableforce.Body_Text:
Challenger +2 (While challenging, this character gets +2{s}.)
Resist +2 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 2.)
You Gave it Your Best: During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you may draw a card.

yaoimperialsoldier.Name: Yao - Imperial Soldier
yaoimperialsoldier.Flavor_Text: "I'm gonna hit you so hard, it'll make your ancestors dizzy."

avalanche.Name: Avalanche
avalanche.Flavor_Text: A little snow never hurt anyone. A big rock however
avalanche.Body_Text: Deal 1 damage to each opposing character. You may banish chosen location.

ifindemiflattenem.Name: I Find 'Em, I Flatten 'Em
ifindemiflattenem.Flavor_Text:
I don't ask how hard the work is
Got a rough, indestructible surface
ifindemiflattenem.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 4 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)
Banish all items.

onelasthope.Name: One Last Hope
onelasthope.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 3 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)
Chosen character gains Resist +2 until the start of your next turn. If a Hero character is chosen, they may also challenge ready character this turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 2.)

themobsong.Name: The Mob Song
themobsong.Body_Text:
Sing Together 10 (Any number of your or your teammates' characters with total cost 10 or more may {e} to sing this song for free.)
Deal 3 damage to up to 3 chosen characters and/or locations.

tritonsdecree.Name: Triton's Decree
tritonsdecree.Flavor_Text: "Ursula's foul creatures are not welcome in my kingdom!"
tritonsdecree.Body_Text: Each opponent chooses one of their characters and deals 2 damage to them.

fortisphere.Name: Fortisphere
fortisphere.Body_Text:
Resourceful: When you play this item, you may draw a card.
Extract of Steel: 1{i}, Banish this item - Chosen character of yours gains Bodyguard until the start of your next turn. (An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

imperialbow.Name: Imperial Bow
imperialbow.Body_Text: Within Range: {e}, 1{i} - Chosen Hero character gains Challenger +2 and Evasive this turn. (They get +2{s} while challenging . They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

rlslegacyscannon.Name: RLS Legacy's Cannon
rlslegacyscannon.Flavor_Text:
"So help me, I'll use the ship's cannons to blast ya all to the kingdom come!"
 -John Silver
rlslegacyscannon.Body_Text: BA-BOOM!: {e}, 2{i}, Discard a card - Deal 2 damage to chosen character or location.

thewallborderfortress.Name: The Wall - Border Fortress
thewallborderfortress.Body_Text: Protect The Realm: While you have an exerted character here, your other locations can't be challenged.

thebesthebigolive.Name: Thebes - The Big Olive
thebesthebigolive.Body_Text: If You Can Make it Here: During your turn, whenever a character banishes another character in a challenge while here, gain 2 lore.

benjabolduniter.Name: Benja - Bold Uniter
benjabolduniter.Flavor_Text: "We must work together to heal the entangled."

kristoffofficialicemaster.Name: Kristoff - Official Ice Master
kristoffofficialicemaster.Flavor_Text:
Kristoff: "You want to talk about a supply and demand problem? I sell ice for a living" 
Anna: "Ooh, that's a rough business to be in right now. I mean, that is really-ah, mm. That's unfortunate."

snowannarainbeaucoolcompetitor.Name: Snowanna Rainbeau - Cool Competitor
snowannarainbeaucoolcompetitor.Flavor_Text: When it comes to racing, she never gets cold feet.
snowannarainbeaucoolcompetitor.Body_Text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)

vanellopevonschweetzrandomrosterracer.Name: Vanellope von Schweetz - Random Roster Racer
vanellopevonschweetzrandomrosterracer.Body_Text:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)
Pixlexia: When you play this character, she gains Evasive until the start of your next turn. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)

snowwhitefairhearted.Franchise: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
snowwhitefairhearted.Name: Snow White - Fair-Hearted
snowwhitefairhearted.Flavor_Text: Friendship is the best armor of all.
snowwhitefairhearted.Body_Text: Natural Leader: This character gains Resist +1 for each other Knight character you have in play. (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1 for each other Knight.)

merlinscottagethewizardshome.Name: Merlin's Cottage - The Wizard's Home
merlinscottagethewizardshome.Body_Text: Knowledge is Power: Each player plays with the top card of their deck face up.

arthurkingvictorious.Name: Arthur - King Victorious
arthurkingvictorious.Body_Text: Shift 5 (You may pay 5{i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Arthur.) Knighted by the King: When you play this character, chosen character gains Challenger +2 and Resist +2 and can challenge ready characters this turn. (They get +2{s} while challenging. Damage dealt to them is reduced by 2.)

sevendwarfsminesecurefortress.Franchise: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
sevendwarfsminesecurefortress.Name: Seven Dwarfs' Mine - Secure Fortress
sevendwarfsminesecurefortress.Body_Text: Mountain Defense: During your turn, the first time you move a character here, you may deal 1 damage to chosen character. If the moved character is a Knight, deal 2 damage instead.
